story:
Short Summary

Our new company OrganoTherapeutics uses human patient specific stem cell technology to generate 3D representations of the human brain, so called mini-brains. Particularly, we do that with stem cell from Patients suffering from Parkinson`s disease. We do that for two main purposes: 1. Find new medications for this devastating disease. 2. Demonstrate that such medications can be found without the use of animal models. Here you can see a bit more about our efforts to replace animal testing by alternative methods: http://organo-therapeutics.com/animal-alternati... This campaign is to collect funding to test two new small molecule compounds (drugs) of which we assume that they could protect the nerve cells in Parkinson`s disease patients to die, so called neuroprotective substances.

 

Our background

The two co-founders, Prof. Dr. Jens C. Schwamborn and Dr. Javier Jarazo have quite some track-record in the fields neuroscience, Parkinson`s disease, alternative methods and stem cell technologies. The company OrganoTherapeutics is a direct spin-off from our academic research lab at the Luxembourg Centre for Systems Biomedicine (http://schwambornlab.uni.lu). Additionally, we have an advisory team with an experienced medical doctor treating Parkinson`s disease and an experienced serial entrepreneur.

More about us at the bottom of this page: http://organo-therapeutics.com/about/

 

The campaign

We are working on two molecules, where we have evidences that they could protect the nerve cells that die in the brain of Parkinson’s disease patients. Normally, these compounds would be tested for this function in animal models (mice, rat or monkeys). However, in this new project we want to demonstrate that it is possible to further develop this compound by using advanced human stem cell technologies. For this approach, we take stem cells from Parkinson’s disease patients and differentiate them into 3D structures that resemble the human brain, so called minibrains. Particularly, we focus on the part of the brain that is mainly affected in the diseases, the midbrain.

We have pioneered this technology: https://www.cell.com/stem-cell-reports/fulltext...

The method itself is patented (https://patents.google.com/patent/WO2017060884A...) and our company has licensed this patent.

Importantly, already earlier this year we were the first world wide to shown that there are disease relevant alterations (e.g. reduced amount of nerve cells) in these mini-brains from Parkinson’s disease patients: https://www.nature.com/articles/s41531-019-0078-4

This is how a human mini-brain in the dish looks like:

What we now want to do is take these patient specific mini-brains and treat them with the novel compounds. We want to find out whether this treatment can improve the situation in the mini-brains and hence whether these compounds can become new drugs for Parkinson’s disease. This project means a lot of work in the lab, we have to grow the stem cells and differentiate them into mini-brains, this differentiation can take 60 or even 90 days. At the same time we have to treat them with the compound. Afterwards the treated mini-brains will be analysed with high-end microscopy. Finally, the microscopy images will be analysed with computational methods, including artificial intelligence (AI) based tools.

The whole approach is described in an overview here: http://organo-therapeutics.com/our-approach-com...

What we need

We are here seeking a contribution of 200.000€. This money shall be used for paying the salary of scientists working on the project as well as for buying the necessary material (cell culture media, growth factors, staining kits etc.). Additionally, we would like to use part of the money for paying for the usage of instruments (e.g. microscopes), high-end computers and state of the art labs. Finally, some money shall be used for outreach and information work, e.g. for the website and for informing the public about our work. Your contribution will help us to further develop, in an animal-testing free manner, new compounds that might be used to treat Parkinson`s disease. You will not only make a contribution for this specific compounds and disease, but also for establishing this animal-testing free approach as a new standard for medication development. We would like to offer all contributors a naming on our website. The top 5 contributors shall be mentioned in the acknowledgements of our next scientific publication. Obviously, we will ask every contributor whether he or she wants to be named.

If you cannot help by contributing money

Please share the information that this campaign exists. Share it on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook or any social media that you might use. Make some noise about it :-)

story:
Our story in short

We are twin brothers, which makes us a very strong team.

The older brother, Siim Kilki, actually 30 seconds older, is master of science in industrial ecology. He works as a teacher and studies to be an independent beekeeper. His studies will end in the beginning of July. Siim has 3 years of experience in strawberry production.

The younger brother, Kaarel Kilki, will be postgraduate in agriculture in June. He works as an agricultural specialist aka agronomist in his own company and in the nearby company, which deals with grains. Kaarel owns 4 year experience in strawberry production and now is applying it in his own company.

Our campaign is a small project to start a business, that really cares about their customers health. Our aim is to communicate with our customers without a middleman, so both, the customer and us will benefit from that relationship.

All the contributors will help us to make this small family business a considerable alternative to mass production goods.


What We Need

There are 6 important investments we would like to cover with your help to get our sweet family farm rolling again. In the order of importance, these are:
  1. Berries' dehydrator 3840 €
  2. Electrical works 1050 €
  3. Plantation of strawberries (0,3 hectares) 3000 €
  4. Plantation of raspberries (0,1 hectares) 1000 €
  5. Irrigation system 1150 €
  6. Beekeeping tools and 2 beehives for pollinating the blossoms of berries 1975 €
  7. 5 % of the budget for the Indiegogo as requiered 600 €
If we can reach at least 3840 € then we will use the money as described above - in order of importance. If we manage to raise less than 3840 € then we will follow the order of importance from the point three and leave the first two investments for the next season.
Once the plants are planted, grown and harvested the berries will be processed with some honey and chia seeds in blender and then the mixture will be dried in dehydrator 24 hours. Sheets of dried mixture will be torn into delicious berry chips which will be packed into cute little paperbags with labels of our farm.

What You Get

If you decide to help us, then according to your contribution we can give you something back as well. Check it out below!
  • Bags of berry chips
  • Honey jars
  • Giftboxes with both of above
  • Hoodies with logo of our farm
  • Tour and a dinner with us in our lovely family farm

The Impact

Our campaign is for the people who want to eat healthy and also like sweet tastes. The importance of this campaign is to make it possible for people to buy quality goods directly from the producer, without the extra profit going to the middleman's pocket. That means we can make better prices for customers.



Risks & Challenges

There are always some risks when you are doing something. The same is with this campaign. Growing strawberries and raspberries are closely linked to weather, but with skilled people it is almost always possible to get a good yield. The same is with beekeeping. We have the minds of doing it and with Your help we can get the best tools for quality food producing. We are also very athletic guys, so there is nothing we can't manage, even if it requires us to work 16 hours a day for a short time. We have done that kind of workdays in our past.

We have already made some investments in this project. We have a pond where we get the water for the strawberries and the raspberries, also we have ordered strawberry plants (Frigo) for 1 hectare. The land is prepared and we'll start planting strawberries at the beginning of May. The first berries should be ready to eat or process at the beginning of July.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help us financially, then share it via Indiegogo sharing tools and via social media all over the world. They have said "Sharing is caring!" and if you share our campaign, then you care for the future of human kind through healthy berry chips.

Cheers, mates!

story:
In October 2013 I came down with a severe case of cerebral malaria.  Now, eighteen months later, and almost fully recovered, I'm trekking for three days at altitudes up to 4800m in Peru on the Salkantay Trek to Machu Picchu in Peru.

If you know me you'll know why I'm raising money for malaria outreach programmes around Victoria Falls.  I was lucky to survive, but every day people less fortunate than me don't.

Malaria is treatable and preventable.  Mosquito nets are cheap.  The medication is cheap.  There's no excuse why, in a world of surplus, people, and especially children, are dying from it, on average one every minute, mostly in Sub-Saharan Africa.  Around Victoria Falls every day tourists spend a fortune, unaware of what's happening just a few miles away.  A few pounds or dollars will make a real difference.


I am splitting the money raised 70/30, with the remaining amount going to Barbary Macaque Awareness and Conservation (BMAC) a charity that runs small-scale socio-conservation projects in Northern Morocco.  They work closely with the local communities to educate and support the rural population and protect the endangered Barbary macaque.

This organisation is under-funded, but their work makes a genuine positive impact in the areas they work and to the people who live there.  Their ultimate goal is to end the illegal trade in Barbary macaques, mainly as pet, and to protect the habitat to ensure the species' survival; they also do very important work in research, local education, rabies vaccination, and highlighting an issue rarely reported and generally ignored.  Again, every pound makes a difference, and you can be sure the money they receive will help the wildlife, environment and people of this poor part of northern Morocco.

For more information visit their website.

I am paying for the trek and my flights to Peru myself.  All other costs are being covered either by me personally or my employers at Oasis Overland.  Apart from the percentage taken from this website, every penny raised is going directly to either Victoria Falls Hospital or BMAC, split 70/30, respectively.

story:
ABOUT US:

My name is Dario Ratta. In 2005, after finishing my studies, driven by the love that binds me to the farmland, I wanted to strengthen the fruitful labors of my parents who created the company Tenuta Serre, a small olive oil farm.


Our company, based on respect of territorial identity, my Salento, as well as on the traditions and craftsmanship of local farmers, uses the constant technical advice of agronomists and mill experts, because our job is to offer a healthy and genuine product, in full compliance with the law of nature.

OUR VISION:
Our company produces Eco-friendly olive oil of excellent quality.
We say "No" to pesticides and everything that harms our health, because we firmly believe that a correct diet  together with a healthy lifestyle are the best prevention.

To attain this goal, we give primary importance to the harvest of the olives done with the appropriate equipment, in order not to damage them.

It is necessary to use shakers, a technologically advanced, propelled, vibrant and energy-saving machine, which allows us to sell the product at a competitive price.

This shaker will be made available to all members of the Olive oil Cooperative “la Fasciana” in Presicce so that all olive oil farmers who do not possess adequate harvesting tools or who do not have the means to buy them, can benefit from it.


HOW YOU CAN HELP:
You can support our project by stamping your name inside a fingerprint, symbol of our oil bottled in handmade terracotta bottles.

The bottle will travel around the world, participating in national and international competitions (Switzerland, Japan, Italy, Denmark, USA).


STAY AND LEARN...You can stay on our farm WWW.TENUTASERRE.COM and experience rural education.


We would be eternally grateful if you can share our campaign via your social networks (e.g.Facebook,Twitter), email, morse code, telegraph, or any other way you can think of!

You can help in many other ways, by talking with your friends and family or sharing our link on your social network...


Spread the word!

----------------

CHI SIAMO:

Mi chiamo Dario Ratta. Nel 2005,terminati gli studi, spinto dall’amore che mi lega alla campagna, ho desiderato rinsaldare le proficue fatiche dei  miei genitori costituendo l'azienda Tenute Serre, una piccola azienda agricola olearia.


La nostra azienda, improntata al rispetto dell'identità territoriale, quella salentina, delle tradizioni e della maestria degli agricoltori locali si avvale della costante consulenza tecnica di agronomi ed esperti oleari perché Il nostro compito è proporvi un prodotto sano e genuino, nel rispetto delle leggi della natura

LA NOSTRA VISIONE:

La nostra azienda produce un olio di oliva biologico di ottima qualitá.

Noi diciamo “No” ai pesticidi e tutto ció che danneggia la nostra salute perché crediamo che l’alimentazione corretta insieme ad uno stile di vita sano sia la migliore prevenzione.

Per migliorare il nostro obiettivo, di primaria importanza é la fase della raccolta delle olive dall´ albero senza danneggiarli, fatta con attrezzature idonee.

Sarebbe indispensabile utilizzare uno scuotitore, una macchina tecnologicamente all´avanguardia, semovente , vibrante, che ci consente di risparmiare energie e poter proporre al consumatore un abbattimento del costo del prodotto.

Questo scuotitore verrà messo a disposizione della cooperativa olearia “la Fasciana” in Presicce in modo che tutti gli agricoltori che non hanno attrezzi idonei ne la possibilità di acquistarli potranno usufruirne.



COME AIUTARCI:

Puoi sostenere i nostro progetto in tantissimi modi… Con un contributo puoi ricevere uno dei nostri bellissimi gadget (perk).

Inseriremo il tuo nome o il nome della tua azienda o altro all’interno di un’ impronta digitale , icona della nostra elegante bottiglia di olio, realizzata artigianalmente in terracotta.

Questa bottiglia farà il giro del mondo e porterà il tuo nome in concorsi nazionali ed internazionali di Olio (Svizzera, USA, Danimarca, Giappone, Italia).


Oppure soggiorna nel nostro Agriturismo a Pescoluse (LECCE) WWW.TENUTASERRE.COM, dove conoscerai le meraviglie storiche e paesaggistiche del Salento più autentico. Fai esperienza di didattica rurale nei nostri uliveti e visita con noi antichi frantoi sotterranei.


                                                               PERK = DONI

Di seguito troverai la lista dei perk, ossia doni che corrispondono alla lista che vedi lateralmente in inglese.

5 €

Tutti i sostenitori da 5€ riceveranno una mail di ringraziamento, personalizzata come riconoscimento della partecipazione al progetto.

15 €

Tutti i sostenitori da 15€ riceveranno una cartolina con la quale  ringrazieremo di aver dato il tuo contributo.

25 €

Con un contributo di 25€ ti scriveremo una mail di ringraziamento e inoltre il TUO nome apparirà sull'adesivo che verrà applicato sullo scuotitore (vedi immagine in alto)  ...riceverai una mail con foto!

100 €

Dando 100€ riceverai una bottiglia in vetro ( 0,75 l) contenente il nostro olio e inoltre inseriremo il TUO nome sull'adesivo che verrà applicato sullo scuotitore (riceverai una foto via mail)

150 €

Con un contributo di 150€, ti spediremo 1 bottiglia in terracotta “Edizione limitata”contenente il nostro olio extravergine, (spedizione prevista: aprile 2015) realizzata appositamente da artigiani locali, con il TUO nome (Persona/ Azienda o altro…) inserito all'interno dell'impronta digitale (vedi bottiglia in foto/video).

Con questa bottiglia parteciperemo ai concorsi internazionali di olio (USA,Giappone, Danimarca, Svizzera, Italia).

250 €

Sostenendo il progetto con 250€ riceverai 3 bottiglie in terracotta “Edizione limitata” contenenti il nostro olio extravergine, (spedizione prevista: aprile 2015) realizzate appositamente da artigiani locali, con il TUO nome (Persona/Azienda o altro…) inserito all'interno dell'impronta digitale (vedi bottiglia in foto/video).

Con questa bottiglia parteciperemo ai concorsi internazionali di olio (USA,Giappone,Danimarca,Svizzera,Italia)  inoltre il TUO nome apparirà sullo  scuotitore.

700 €

Con una donazione di 700€ avrai la possibilità di trascorrere 3 notti per 2 persone in camera matrimoniale nel nostro Agriturismo a Pescoluse (LECCE)(pernottamento e prima colazione con prodotti artigianali inclusa)... Partecipando al nostro progetto: “SOGGIORNA E APPRENDI” :

 - se verrai da noi ad aprile o maggio: farai un corso di impasto e realizzazione pasta fresca salentina (con successiva cena) e inoltre ti offriamo una visita guidata negli antichi frantoi sotterranei.

- qualora dovessi decidere di venire da noi ad ottobre o novembre: trascorreremo una giornata raccogliendo le olive (picnic compreso) ,ti faremo visitare con una guida gli antichi frantoi sotterranei e ti mostreremo come degustare l'olio, da poter riconoscere le differenze di qualità. Ti spediremo poi una bottiglia del nostro olio extravergine di oliva da TE raccolto! (spedizione inclusa)


1000 € 

Al livello 1000€, oltre alle 3 bottiglie in terracotta "Edizione limitata" contenente il nostro olio extravergine e al TUO nome stampato sull'adesivo dello scuotitore, ti invitiamo a soggiornare da noi (5 notti) ad aprile o maggio o giugno (soggiorno previsto per 2 persone in camera matrimoniale con prima colazione con prodotti artigianali compresa) nel nostro Agriturismo a Pescoluse (LECCE).

Aiuta a spargere voce

Non tutti possono dare un contributo economico, ma ció non significa che non possono aiutarci.
Puoi sostenerci in tantissimi altri modi , parlandone con i tuoi amici e parenti, condividendo questo nostro link sul tuo social network preferito … o in qualsiasi modo ti viene in mente.
Passa parola!


come si fa

Contribuire al progetto è semplice, segui queste istruzioni!


Cliccando sulla casella della donazione scelta (nella colonna di destra: "Select a perk") si apre la pagina

Qui puoi modificare l'importo del contributo, volendo.

Se non hai già selezionato un perk, compare l'importo minimo di 5€
Se vuoi contribuire con una somma più alta, a tua scelta, modifica l'importo.
Se vuoi invece scegliere un perk, selezionalo cliccandoci sopra, nella lista che trovi nella stessa pagina, più in basso, subito sotto la scritta "Which perk would you like?"

Se vuoi rimanere anonimo, seleziona la casella "Don't display my name on the campaign page".

A questo punto Indiegogo ti chiede conferma della tua scelta rispetto al perk, e ti chiede di inserire l'email:

1) scrivi la tua email nella casella "Contact information"

2) deseleziona "I'd like to receive Indiegogo's weekly newsletter" se non vuoi ricevere la newsletter settimanale del sito

Nella stessa pagina, se hai scelto un perk di cui si prevede la spedizione a domicilio, sotto quello dell'email compare il quadro dell'indirizzo di consegna ("Shipping Information"):

La prima riga dell'indirizzo è per il solo numero civico, la seconda è per la via. Se compili solo una riga indiegogo non riconosce la compilazione come corretta.

fatto questo, clicca su Continue

 

Ti viene chiesto di scegliere tra il pagamento diretto con la carta di credito e quello attraverso il sito di paypal (da cui puoi pagare sia con carta di credito, sia con paypal, se lo usi)

pagamento diretto con la carta di credito

Se hai scelto un perk che viene spedito, il sistema conserva in automatico i dati di consegna attribuendoli anche alla carta di credito (deseleziona "Same as my shipping address" se non è così)

 

 

Se invece non hai già inserito un tuo indirizzo postale, la schermata presenta un form completo:

 

pagamento attraverso il sito di paypal (con carta di credito o da un conto paypal)

Nel caso tu voglia usare la carta di credito, passare attraverso paypal ha il piccolo vantaggio di poter impostare la lingua e compilare il form di pagamento in italiano. Ecco come:
Prosegui cliccando su "GO TO PAYPAL"

Sei su paypal

Se hai un conto paypal e intendi versare il contributo con paypal, fai il log in nella parte alta della schermata

Se vuoi invece usare una carta di credito, clicca su "Pay with a credit or debit card" nella parte bassa della schermata.

Pay

Ora puoi selezionare "Italy" come paese, ed "Italiano" come lingua, per compilare agevolmente tutti i campi obbligatori e terminare il processo di pagamento

 

 

Se non sei interessato a creare un account PayPal, deseleziona la casella "Salva questi dati su un conto Paypal". Prosegui cliccando su "Rivedi e continua"

 

 

Dando l'ultima conferma, avrai contribuito alla realizzazione del nostro progetto!




----------------------

WER WIR SIND

Mein Name ist Dario Ratta. Nachdem ich 2005 mein Studium abgeschlossen hatte, beschloss ich in die Fußstapfen meiner Eltern zu treten, welche  bereits seit Jahrzehnten ein Landwirtschaftsbetrieb haben und über viele Jahre, ihr eigenes, hochwertiges Olivenöl produzieren.


Ich gründete so das kleine Familienunternehmen „Tenuta Serre“

Mittels umweltschonender Anbaumethoden, raschester Verarbeitung der Oliven, gelingt es uns den mehrhundertjährigen Olivenhainen einzigartige Olivenöle abzugewinnen.

Dank der stetigen Zusammenarbeit mit Agraringeneuren und anderen Fachkräften gelingt es uns, ein gesundes und qualitätsvolles Olivenöl herzustellen.

UNSERE VISION:

Unser Landwirtschaftsunternehmen stellt wertvolles Olivenöl her, frei von gesundheitsschädlichen Pestiziden.

Wir haben uns bewusst  gegen gesundheitsgefährdende Pestizide entschieden, weil wir davon überzeugt sind, dass gesunde Ernährung zusammen mit einer gesunden Lebensweise die beste Prävention sind und somit dazu beitragen Krankheiten vorzubeugen.

Um die Qualität eines guten Öls zu bewahren, ist bereits die Ernte der Früchte von großer Bedeutung. Durch eine schonende Erntemethoden werden die gesunden, keinesfalls vollreifen  Oliven, nicht verletzt und direkt vom Baum geerntet. Ernte bedeutet für uns heute: mit Hilfe eines schweren Kammes werden die Oliven aus der Baumkrone gestreift, diese Fallen auf Netze, die unter jeden einzelnen Baum ausgelegt werden. Anschließend werden die Früchte eingesammelt und einzeln sortiert…dieses Verfahren wird bei mehreren Hektar Land unzählige Male wiederholt.

WAS WIR BENÖTIGEN:

Diese mühevolle, kosten- , und zeitintensive Arbeit kann durch einen innovativen Rüttelmaschinen erleichtert werden. Wie das Wort „Rüttelmaschinen“ impliziert, werden die Oliven bei dieser Erntemethode durch das Rütteln des Olivenbaums mit einem Rüttler, der den Stamm des Baumes mit einer Zange greift, vom Baum „gerüttelt“ und in darunter gespannten Netzen aufgefangen. Der Vorteil dieser Methode ist, dass die Oliven gesund bleiben und nicht beschädigt werden und durch die niedrigeren Produktionskosten das wertvolle Öl zu einem erschwinglichen Preis erworben werden kann.

Dieser "Olivenbaumrüttler" wird den Olivenbauern der Ölmühle "La Fasciana" in Presicce zur Verfügung gestellt, die weder die nötigen Werkzeuge noch die finanziellen Mittel haben, sich das entsprechende Werkzeug zu kaufen.



WAS IHR DAVON HABT UND WIE DU UNS UNTERSTÜTZEN KANNST:
Du kannst uns auf viele unterschiedliche Arten unterstützen…

Mit einer finanziellen Unterstützung erhälst  Du ein besonderes Dankeschön (Perk).
Beispielsweise wird Dein Name oder Firmenname oder ähnliches auf dem Fingerabdruck, Symbol unserer Terracotta Flasche zu sehen sein. Hierbei handelt es sich um eine limitierte Auflage, die speziell für uns von Hand angefertigt wurde.
Unser Öl wird in dieser Flasche anschließend an nationalen und internationalen „Feinschmecker Olivenöl Awards“ teilnehmen.

Wir nehmen Dich also mit nach Zürich, USA, Japan, Dänemark und Italien und werben (sollte der Firmenname aufgedruckt sein)für Dein Unternehmen.


Oder verbringe einige Tage in unserem Agrotourismus in Pescoluse (LECCE) www.tenutaserre.com und verliebe Dich in die beeindruckenden Farben und Klänge der Natur.
Wo Du das ursprüngliche und authentische Leben kennenlernen und sich dabei gesunder und geschmackvoller Gaumenfreuden hingeben kannst… umhüllt von bereits vergessenen Aromen und Düften.
Ein Ort, der kostbare Erinnerungen und Emotionen schenkt.

                                               PERK /Gadgets= DANKESCHÖN
Hier findest Du die Übersetzung der sog. Perks, die links in englischer Sprache  zu finden sind.


                                                                            5 €
Jeder, der uns mit 5€ unterstützt erhält von uns eine e mail, in der wir uns persönlich für den erhaltenen Beitrag bedanken.


                                                                           15 €
All denjenigen, die uns mit 15€ unterstützen, werden wir eine wunderschöne Postkarte zukommen lassen, in der wir uns persönlich bedanken.


                                                                          25 €
Mit einem Beitrag von 25€ bekommst Du von uns eine „Dankeschön  e mail“ und zusätzlich erscheint Dein Name auf unserem Rüttler (wir werden Dir, als Beweis, ein Foto davon via mail senden)


                                                                       100 €
Wenn Du uns mit 100€ unterstützt, erhälst Du von uns eine Glasflasche (0,75 l) von unserem Olivenöl und Dein Name erscheint auf unserem “Rüttler”, da wir uns stets daran erinnern möchten, daß wir durch Deinen Beitrag unser Ziel erreicht haben.


                                                                       150 €
Unterstützt Du unser Projekt mit 150€, erhälst Du von uns eine Flasche unserer „limitierten Auflage“ von unserem Olio extravergine (Versand  im April 2015).

Diese Flasche ist etwas Besonderes, denn Dein Name oder Firmenname oder ähnliches sind Bestandteil des Fingerabdrucks, Symbol unserer Terracotta Flasche.
Unser Öl wird in dieser Flasche anschließend an nationalen und internationalen „Feinschmecker Olivenöl Awards“ teilnehmen. Wir nehmen Dich also mit nach Zürich, USA, Dänemark und Italien und werben (sollte der Firmenname aufgedruckt sein) somit für Dein Unternehmen.


                                                                      250 €
Bei 250€ erhälst Du eine Geschenkpackung mit 3 Terracotta Flaschen “Limited edition”, die unser Olivenöl enthalten (Versand: April 2015) . Du entscheidest, ob auf unserer Flasche Dein Name, Firmenname oder der Name einer anderen Person stehen soll…und machst die Flasche somit auch zu einem besonderen Geschenk.

                                                                     700 €
Steuerst Du uns 700€ bei, laden wir Dich ein, 3 Nächte (für 2 Personen) in unserem Agrotourismus in einem Olivenhain am Meer in Pescoluse zu verbringen (mit Übernachtung und ausgiebigem Frühstück)… Nehme an unserer Aktion: „Entspanne und Lerne“ teil:
-    Entscheidest Du Dich dazu im April oder Mai zu uns zu kommen, bieten wir Dir einen Kurs an, indem Du lernen kannst, nach "Original Salento Art" frische Pasta zuzubereiten (mit anschließendem, gemeinsamen Abendessen) und wir laden Dich ein, die antiken, unterirdischen Ölmühlen zu besichtigen.

-    Liebst Du die Natur, und besuchst Du uns im Oktober oder November, verbringen wir gemeinsam einen Tag im Olivenhain. Wir ernten gemeinsam die reifen Früchte und Picknicken im Schatten der Olivenbäume, besichtigen gemeinsam die unterirdischen Ölmühlen. Zusätzlich wirst Du an einer Ölverkostung teilnehmen, in der Du Qualitätsunterschiede wahrnehmen kannst und lernst, hochwertiges Öl von kommerziellem Öl zu unterscheiden.

Natürlich erhälst Du am Ende des Aufenthalts eine Flasche Deines Öls, dessen Früchte Du selbst geerntet hast.

                                                                1000 €
1000€ sind für uns eine große Unterstützung und auch hier wirst Du bestimmt nicht leer ausgehen…Du erhälst 3 von unseren Terrcotta Flaschen, die unser Olivenöl extravergine enthalten, Dein Name wird auf unserem „Rüttler“ stehen und wir laden Dich und eine Person Deiner Wahl ein, im April, Mai oder Juni 5 Nächte in unserem Agrotourismus zu verbringen (Übernachtung in einem Doppelzimmer und Frühstück mit selbsthergestellten Produkten inklusive).
Entspanne und Genieße..und lerne die zauberhafte Gegend kennen.
Diese Perks eignen sich wunderbar auch als Geschenk!

Benötigst Du Hilfe mit Deiner Spende, so schreib uns auf: info@tenutaserre.com !

Wir sind für jeden Betrag, den Ihr spenden könnt dankbar. So kommen wir unserem Ziel immer näher.

Und auch wenn Ihr nicht spenden könnt: wenn Ihr allen von der Kampagne erzählt, erreichen wir bestimmt genug Leute, die etwas spenden möchten. Also freuen wir uns auch, wenn Ihr die Kampagne fleißig in allen sozialen Netzen teilt und Euren Freunden und Familien davon erzählt.

So oder so danken wir Euch 1000fach für Eure Hilfe und Unterstützung!

ABOUT US:My name is Dario 
Ratta. In 2005, after finishing my 
studies, driven by the love
that binds me to the farmland, 
I wanted to strengthen the
fruitful labors 
of my parents who created the company
Tenuta Serre, a small olive oil farm.
Our company, based on respect of territorial identity, my Salento, as well as on the
traditions and craftsmanship 
of local farmers, uses the constant
technical advice of agronomists
and mill experts, 
because our job is to offer
a healthy and genuine product, 
in full compliance with the law 
of nature.OUR VISION:Our company produces Eco-friendly olive oil of excellent quality.We say "No" to pesticides
and everything that 
harms our health, because we firmly believe that
a correct diet  together with a
healthy lifestyle are the best prevention.
To attain this goal, we give primary importance
to the harvest of the olives done with the appropriate equipment,
in order not to damage them.
It is necessary to use shakers, a technologically advanced, propelled,
 vibrant and energy-saving machine, which allows us to sell the product at a competitive price.This shaker will be made available to all members of the Olive oil Cooperative “la Fasciana” in Presicce so that all olive oil farmers who do not possess adequate harvesting tools or who do not have the means to buy them, can benefit from it.

by talking with your friends and family or sharing our link on your social network...

Al livello 1000€, oltre alle 3 bottiglie in terracotta "Edizione limitata" contenente il nostro olio extravergine e al TUO nome stampato sull'adesivo dello scuotitore, ti invitiamo a soggiornare da noi (5 notti) ad aprile o maggio o giugno (soggiorno previsto per 2 persone in camera matrimoniale con prima colazione con prodotti artigianali compresa) nel nostro Agriturismo a Pescoluse (LECCE).
Aiuta a spargere voce
Non tutti possono dare un contributo economico, ma ció non significa che non possono aiutarci.Puoi sostenerci in tantissimi altri modi , parlandone con i tuoi amici e parenti, condividendo questo nostro link sul tuo social network preferito … o in qualsiasi modo ti viene in mente.Passa parola! 
come si fa
Contribuire al progetto è semplice, segui queste istruzioni!Cliccando sulla casella della donazione scelta (nella colonna di destra: "Select a perk") si apre la pagina

Qui puoi modificare l'importo del contributo, volendo. Se non hai già selezionato un perk, compare l'importo minimo di 5€Se vuoi contribuire con una somma più alta, a tua scelta, modifica l'importo.
 Se vuoi invece scegliere un perk, selezionalo cliccandoci sopra, nella 
lista che trovi nella stessa pagina, più in basso, subito sotto la 
scritta "Which perk would you like?"Se vuoi rimanere anonimo, seleziona la casella "Don't display my name on the campaign page".

A questo punto Indiegogo ti chiede conferma della tua scelta rispetto al perk, e ti chiede di inserire l'email:1) scrivi la tua email nella casella "Contact information" 2) deseleziona "I'd like to receive Indiegogo's weekly newsletter" se non vuoi ricevere la newsletter settimanale del sito

Nella stessa pagina, se hai scelto un perk di cui si prevede la spedizione a domicilio, sotto quello dell'email compare il quadro dell'indirizzo di consegna ("Shipping Information"):

La prima riga dell'indirizzo è per il solo numero civico, la seconda è
 per la via. Se compili solo una riga indiegogo non riconosce la 
compilazione come corretta.
fatto questo, clicca su Continue

 
Ti viene chiesto di scegliere tra il pagamento 
diretto con la carta di credito e quello attraverso il sito di paypal 
(da cui puoi pagare sia con carta di credito, sia con paypal, se lo usi)pagamento diretto con la carta di credito
 Se hai scelto un perk che viene spedito, il sistema conserva in 
automatico i dati di consegna attribuendoli anche alla carta di credito 
(deseleziona "Same as my shipping address" se non è così)
 

 
Se invece non hai già inserito un tuo indirizzo postale, la schermata presenta un form completo:

 
pagamento attraverso il sito di paypal (con carta di credito o da un conto paypal)
Nel caso tu voglia usare la carta di credito, 
passare attraverso paypal ha il piccolo vantaggio di poter impostare la 
lingua e compilare il form di pagamento in italiano. Ecco come: Prosegui cliccando su "GO TO PAYPAL"Sei su paypalSe hai un conto paypal e intendi versare il contributo con paypal, fai il log in nella parte alta della schermataSe vuoi invece usare una carta di credito, clicca su "Pay with a credit or debit card" nella parte bassa della schermata.Pay Ora puoi selezionare "Italy" come paese, ed "Italiano" come lingua, per compilare agevolmente tutti i campi obbligatori e terminare il processo di pagamento
 

 
Se non sei interessato a creare un account PayPal, deseleziona la casella "Salva questi dati su un conto Paypal". Prosegui cliccando su "Rivedi e continua"
 

 
Dando l'ultima conferma, avrai contribuito alla realizzazione del nostro progetto!

----------------------WER WIR SIND

Mein Name ist Dario Ratta. Nachdem ich 2005 mein Studium abgeschlossen
hatte, beschloss ich in die Fußstapfen meiner Eltern zu treten, welche  bereits seit Jahrzehnten ein Landwirtschaftsbetrieb
haben und über viele Jahre, ihr eigenes, hochwertiges Olivenöl produzieren.

Ich gründete so das kleine Familienunternehmen „Tenuta Serre“
Mittels
umweltschonender Anbaumethoden, raschester Verarbeitung der Oliven, gelingt es
uns den mehrhundertjährigen Olivenhainen einzigartige Olivenöle abzugewinnen. 
Dank der stetigen
Zusammenarbeit mit Agraringeneuren und anderen Fachkräften gelingt es uns, ein
gesundes und qualitätsvolles Olivenöl herzustellen.
UNSERE
VISION:
Unser
Landwirtschaftsunternehmen stellt wertvolles Olivenöl her, frei von gesundheitsschädlichen
Pestiziden.
Wir haben uns bewusst  gegen gesundheitsgefährdende
Pestizide entschieden, weil wir davon überzeugt sind, dass gesunde Ernährung
zusammen mit einer gesunden Lebensweise die beste Prävention sind und somit
dazu beitragen Krankheiten vorzubeugen.
Um die Qualität eines guten
Öls zu bewahren, ist bereits die Ernte der Früchte von großer Bedeutung. Durch
eine schonende Erntemethoden werden die gesunden, keinesfalls vollreifen  Oliven, nicht verletzt und direkt vom Baum
geerntet. Ernte bedeutet für uns heute: mit Hilfe eines schweren Kammes werden
die Oliven aus der Baumkrone gestreift, diese Fallen auf Netze, die unter jeden
einzelnen Baum ausgelegt werden. Anschließend werden die Früchte eingesammelt
und einzeln sortiert…dieses Verfahren wird bei mehreren Hektar Land unzählige
Male wiederholt.
WAS WIR BENÖTIGEN:
Diese mühevolle, kosten- ,
und zeitintensive Arbeit kann durch einen innovativen Rüttelmaschinen
erleichtert werden. Wie das Wort „Rüttelmaschinen“ impliziert, werden die
Oliven bei dieser Erntemethode durch das Rütteln des Olivenbaums mit einem
Rüttler, der den Stamm des Baumes mit einer Zange greift, vom Baum „gerüttelt“
und in darunter gespannten Netzen aufgefangen. Der Vorteil dieser Methode ist, dass die Oliven gesund
bleiben und nicht beschädigt werden und durch die niedrigeren Produktionskosten
das wertvolle Öl zu einem erschwinglichen Preis erworben werden kann. Dieser "Olivenbaumrüttler" wird den Olivenbauern der Ölmühle "La Fasciana" in Presicce zur Verfügung gestellt, die weder die nötigen Werkzeuge noch die finanziellen Mittel haben, sich das entsprechende Werkzeug zu kaufen.

WAS IHR DAVON
HABT UND WIE DU UNS UNTERSTÜTZEN KANNST:Du kannst uns auf viele unterschiedliche Arten unterstützen…Mit einer finanziellen Unterstützung erhälst  Du ein besonderes Dankeschön (Perk).Beispielsweise wird Dein Name oder Firmenname oder ähnliches auf dem Fingerabdruck, Symbol unserer Terracotta Flasche zu sehen sein. Hierbei handelt es sich um eine limitierte Auflage, die speziell für uns von Hand angefertigt wurde.Unser Öl wird in dieser Flasche anschließend an nationalen und internationalen „Feinschmecker Olivenöl Awards“ teilnehmen. Wir nehmen Dich also mit nach Zürich, USA, Japan, Dänemark und Italien und werben (sollte der Firmenname aufgedruckt sein)für Dein Unternehmen.Oder verbringe einige Tage in unserem Agrotourismus in Pescoluse (LECCE) www.tenutaserre.com und verliebe Dich in die beeindruckenden Farben und Klänge der Natur.Wo Du das ursprüngliche und authentische Leben kennenlernen und sich dabei gesunder und geschmackvoller Gaumenfreuden hingeben kannst… umhüllt von bereits vergessenen Aromen und Düften.Ein Ort, der kostbare Erinnerungen und Emotionen schenkt.                                               PERK /Gadgets= DANKESCHÖNHier findest Du die Übersetzung der sog. Perks, die links in englischer Sprache  zu finden sind.                                                                            5 € Jeder, der uns mit 5€ unterstützt erhält von uns eine e mail, in der wir uns persönlich für den erhaltenen Beitrag bedanken.                                                                           15 € All denjenigen, die uns mit 15€ unterstützen, werden wir eine wunderschöne Postkarte zukommen lassen, in der wir uns persönlich bedanken.                                                                          25 €Mit einem Beitrag von 25€ bekommst Du von uns eine „Dankeschön  e mail“ und zusätzlich erscheint Dein Name auf unserem Rüttler (wir werden Dir, als Beweis, ein Foto davon via mail senden)                                                                       100 €Wenn Du uns mit 100€ unterstützt, erhälst Du von uns eine Glasflasche (0,75 l) von unserem Olivenöl und Dein Name erscheint auf unserem “Rüttler”, da wir uns stets daran erinnern möchten, daß wir durch Deinen Beitrag unser Ziel erreicht haben.                                                                       150 €Unterstützt Du unser Projekt mit 150€, erhälst Du von uns eine Flasche unserer „limitierten Auflage“ von unserem Olio extravergine (Versand  im April 2015).Diese Flasche ist etwas Besonderes, denn Dein Name oder Firmenname oder ähnliches sind Bestandteil des Fingerabdrucks, Symbol unserer Terracotta Flasche. Unser Öl wird in dieser Flasche anschließend an nationalen und internationalen „Feinschmecker Olivenöl Awards“ teilnehmen. Wir nehmen Dich also mit nach Zürich, USA, Dänemark und Italien und werben (sollte der Firmenname aufgedruckt sein) somit für Dein Unternehmen.                                                                      250 €Bei 250€ erhälst Du eine Geschenkpackung mit 3 Terracotta Flaschen “Limited edition”, die unser Olivenöl enthalten (Versand: April 2015) . Du entscheidest, ob auf unserer Flasche Dein Name, Firmenname oder der Name einer anderen Person stehen soll…und machst die Flasche somit auch zu einem besonderen Geschenk.                                                                     700 €Steuerst Du uns 700€ bei, laden wir Dich ein, 3 Nächte (für 2 Personen) in unserem Agrotourismus in einem Olivenhain am Meer in Pescoluse zu verbringen (mit Übernachtung und ausgiebigem Frühstück)… Nehme an unserer Aktion: „Entspanne und Lerne“ teil:-    Entscheidest Du Dich dazu im April oder Mai zu uns zu kommen, bieten wir Dir einen Kurs an, indem Du lernen kannst, nach "Original Salento Art" frische Pasta zuzubereiten (mit anschließendem, gemeinsamen Abendessen) und wir laden Dich ein, die antiken, unterirdischen Ölmühlen zu besichtigen.-    Liebst Du die Natur, und besuchst Du uns im Oktober oder November, verbringen wir gemeinsam einen Tag im Olivenhain. Wir ernten gemeinsam die reifen Früchte und Picknicken im Schatten der Olivenbäume, besichtigen gemeinsam die unterirdischen Ölmühlen. Zusätzlich wirst Du an einer Ölverkostung teilnehmen, in der Du Qualitätsunterschiede wahrnehmen kannst und lernst, hochwertiges Öl von kommerziellem Öl zu unterscheiden.Natürlich erhälst Du am Ende des Aufenthalts eine Flasche Deines Öls, dessen Früchte Du selbst geerntet hast.                                                                1000 € 1000€ sind für uns eine große Unterstützung und auch hier wirst Du bestimmt nicht leer ausgehen…Du erhälst 3 von unseren Terrcotta Flaschen, die unser Olivenöl extravergine enthalten, Dein Name wird auf unserem „Rüttler“ stehen und wir laden Dich und eine Person Deiner Wahl ein, im April, Mai oder Juni 5 Nächte in unserem Agrotourismus zu verbringen (Übernachtung in einem Doppelzimmer und Frühstück mit selbsthergestellten Produkten inklusive). Entspanne und Genieße..und lerne die zauberhafte Gegend kennen.Diese Perks eignen sich wunderbar auch als Geschenk!Benötigst Du Hilfe mit Deiner Spende, so schreib uns auf: info@tenutaserre.com !
Wir sind für jeden Betrag, den Ihr spenden könnt dankbar. So kommen wir unserem Ziel immer näher. Und
 auch wenn Ihr nicht spenden könnt: wenn Ihr allen von der Kampagne 
erzählt, erreichen wir bestimmt genug Leute, die etwas spenden möchten. 
Also freuen wir uns auch, wenn Ihr die Kampagne fleißig in allen 
sozialen Netzen teilt und Euren Freunden und Familien davon erzählt.So oder so danken wir Euch 1000fach für Eure Hilfe und Unterstützung!

story:
Our Story:

As Dr. Bessel Van Der Kolk, psychiatrist who is recognized internationally as a leader in the field of trauma, states,

“Trauma is a disease of not being able to be present”

Our Pilot Yoga and Music Therapy Program:

In this five-week course for women in Madison, Wisconsin, Jody Alexander, yoga teacher who also has a background in Tension Release Exercises (TRE) and Samantha Sinai, MT-BC (Board-Certified Music Therapist) will collaborate to invite participants to befriend their body, improve self-regulating skills and practice being present.

How?

Utilizing invitational language, Ms. Alexander and Ms. Sinai will aim to create an environment of curiosity as participants explore movement and meditation. In each one-hour class, held in a community room at a local Clinical Counselor and Art Therapist’s office, Ms. Alexander will lead the participants in about forty minutes of yoga intended to encourage participants to listen to their bodies in order to learn to feel safe in their bodies. The exercises are also intended to relax the body and improve self-regulating skills. For a sample trauma sensitive yoga demonstration, please view the following video:

Towards the end of class, Ms. Sinai will guide the participants through a music-assisted relaxation utilizing live, original, soothing cello compositions and her voice to guide participants through various breathing exercises as well as body awareness techniques. This guided relaxation is intended to invite participants to enter a deeper state of relaxation and to enhance the effects of the yoga portion of the class by encouraging participants to gently move their attention from the mind and thoughts to an awareness of the body. Depending on participant needs, Ms. Sinai may also utilize other evidence-based Music Therapy interventions such as group singing to encourage emotional expression, improve confidence and strengthen group cohesion.

Our Intent:

We know that both music therapy and yoga as individual modalities have had positive effects for individuals who have experienced trauma. We truly believe that this collaboration of bringing yoga and music therapy together will be beneficial for participants as well.  We hope that the tools given in this class will have a positive effect both during the class and that participants can incorporate these modalities into their own healing journey. Because this is a pilot program, we look forward to compiling quantitative and qualitative research, with the permission of our participants, in order to improve our class for the future and to educate other practitioners about the benefits and/or challenges of this collaboration. We plan to focus on the following questions:

1.  What were the benefits of putting yoga and music therapy together for reducing anxiety?

2.  How did the class affect each participant’s anxiety

                a.  During the one-hour class

                b. In day-to-day life.

Our Fundraising Goal:

If we succeed in reaching our goal of raising $550, we would be able to provide full scholarships to women who are interested in the class.  The funds would also cover our room rental fee, all advertising and other overhead costs. If we exceed this amount, we will use the funds for future Yoga/Music Therapy classes. Thank you so much for considering donating to this cause.

Interested in Learning More?

o  For more information about Music Therapy please visit www.musictherapy.org

o  For more information about TRE please visit www.traumaprevention.com

story:
Ever wonder why you flip your pillow to the cool side when you cannot sleep? Because temperature is key to good sleep!

Moona is a patent-pending smart sleep system that induces and deepens sleep, by smartly adjusting your head and neck temperature throughout the night. It will also help you wake up naturally, and be ready for the day! A clinical study is ongoing at Nantes Hospital, France.

Our body needs different temperatures at different moments in the night. Moona understands your sleeping pattern and regulates the temperature of your head and neck to help you get the best sleep.

Doctors have shown that temperature is a key parameter of sleep (Wall Street Journal).

To fall asleep, our body temperature needs to cool down: we need to lose approximately 1°C (1.8ºF). And cooler temperatures help get deeper sleep. At the end of the night, it is opposite: our body needs to warm up to wake up gently and be productive quickly.

Evolution of body temperature throughout the night

Moona is a water-based system which brings cooling and heating to your head in a smooth and natural way, guaranteeing the best sleep experience. The product is composed of 4 key elements. (There are no electronics under the head : just a thin membrane with water and memory foam.) 

 

Getting good sleep is very important to making the most out of your day. With Moona, you will improve your mood and energy. Getting quality sleep is also key to your health. This why, from the very beginning of the project, we have worked with sleep doctors. In collaboration with the University Hospital Center of Nantes, we are conducting a clinical study to demonstrate Moona's efficacy.

 

Our world is in the middle of a sleep crisis but not everyone is aware of it. Lack of good quality sleep has profound consequences on our daily lives. It affects our health, our job performance, our relationships and our happiness.

Poor sleep may put you at risk of several health issues, such as: 

  • Obesity, 
  • Diabetes, 
  • Cardiovascular diseases and hypertension, 
  • Immune function disorders... 

As best-selling author Arianna Huffington puts it: “Only by renewing our relationship with sleep can we take back control of our lives.” That’s why we created Moona, with the ambition to help you sleep better and, more importantly, live better. Sleep with Moona and enjoy the best your life has to offer.

 

 

 

With a patent-pending technology, the Moona smart sleep system will learn over time to adapt your temperature profile throughout the night and the year. 

Before your first night with Moona, you will fill out a sleep questionnaire to determine your sleeper's profile. Then, Moona will guide you through optimizing it during a 10-day period. After that, Moona will adapt the temperature profile (ºC/ºF) to optimize your sleep, using data from: 

  • the integrated sleep tracker,
  • ambient temperature and humidity sensors,
  • temperature changes made during the night,
  • feedback provided in the app.

Our system is based on the latest sleep research literature and we are training it with sleep data from our beta testers. The more users we will have, the smarter the system will get. It will then be able to learn and adapt to each user more efficiently.

 

 

Your bedroom is a cocoon. We have worked very hard to create a product that blends into your bedroom and an experience that seamlessly helps you sleep, without struggle.

Moona is quick and easy to set up.

Even at 3am, it is very easy to change the temperature on the product if need be, and of course you do not have to open the app for that. We have done more than 200 user tests to get a great experience - even in the middle of the night.

 

Keep your favorite pillow:

Moona goes on top of any standard pillow, no matter the shape or material. Our beta-testers tried with synthetic, memory foam, orthopedic pillows and with all kind of shapes and sizes. We've iterated on more than 30 material combinations to guarantee optimal thermal efficiency and comfort. The pillow pad is an obsessively engineered combination of memory foam and thin water channels.

 

 

We know how comfort is key to our sleep so we created a product that not only enhances your sleep quality but also adds extra comfort to your sleep experience.

Don’t you love putting your head on a cool pillow when you go to bed? How about if you could have that great feeling over and over again during the night?

  • The pad is flexible so it follows your move during the night
  • The cover is made of cotton. It is removable and machine washable
  • The bedside device is very silent (<25db, less than a whisper)

 

 

Throughout our journey developing Moona, more than 200 beta-testers have given us precious feedback on our product. That is over 350 nights of sleep ... a year of sleep data ! Here is what some of them said:

 

  

  

 

To develop Moona, we are working with doctors. A medical thesis on Moona’s system is ongoing at the Hospital of Nantes. And here are some of the research papers we used:

  • Kazue Okamoto-Mizuno, Kazuyo Tsuzuki, Koh Mizuno. "Effects of head cooling on human sleep stages and body temperature." International Journal of Biometeorology (December 2003)
  • Leon C. Lack, Michael Gradisar, Eus J. W. Van Someren, Helen R. Wright, Kurt Lushington. "The relationship between insomnia and body temperatures." Sleep Medicine Reviews (August 2008)
  • Nico Romeijn, Roy J. E. M. Raymann, Els Møst, Bart Te Lindert, Wisse P. Van Der Meijden, Rolf Fronczek, German Gomez­Herrero, Eus J. W. Van Someren. "Sleep, vigilance and thermosensitivity." Pflügers Archiv (January 2012) 
  • Roy J.E.M. Raymann, Dick F. Swaab, Eus J.W. Van Someren. "Skin temperature and sleep-onset latency: Changes with age and insomnia." Physiology & Behavior (February 2007) 
  • Saul S. Gilbert, Cameron J. van den Heuvel, Sally A. Ferguson, Drew Dawson. "Thermoregulation as a sleep signalling system." Sleep Medicine Reviews (April 2004)

 

 

Demo of Moona as of September 2017:

 

We want Moona to be a night and life-changing product. 

That’s why we’re doing everything that is in our power to design the perfect sleep product. But we need your help - your feedback, suggestions, and above all, excitement - to help us build Moona up to the potential it can be.

The funds we raise will go directly to help us deliver a high-quality product, that is rigorously tested and manufactured. It will help us invest in tooling for production, testing and quality assurance.

Back our project, share our page, and let’s make this happen! We’re counting on you!

  

 

 

We would like to thank all of you who have contributed to bringing this project to life, through creative, technical, medical and financial support, and more importantly by testing, giving us precious feedback and insights to develop our product. This includes our friends and families, testers, mentors and advisors, HAX, Centrale Paris Incubator, Agoranov, Zagatub, the University Hospital Center of Nantes, La French Tech, Business France, BPI. Thanks to Sidekick Creatives for making our Kickstarter video.

Here are pictures of some of the tests we have done. Thanks to all our beta-testers for their feedbacks and ideas!

 Some of the designs we worked on 

And here are some of our prototypes:

 Press kit | Facebook | Twitter | LinkedIn

French

Moona - Régulation intelligente de la température de l'oreiller pour améliorer le sommeil

Vous êtes-vous déjà demandé pourquoi vous retourniez votre oreiller du côté frais quand vous n’arrivez pas à dormir ? Parce que la température est un facteur clé du sommeil !

Moona est un système breveté intelligent qui permet de s'endormir plus rapidement et d'avoir plus de sommeil profond, en ajustant intelligemment la température de la tête et du cou tout au long de la nuit. Moona vous aidera aussi à vous réveiller naturellement et à bien commencer la journée !

 

Notre corps a besoin de différentes températures à différents moments de la nuit. Moona comprend votre rythme de sommeil et régule la température de votre tête et de votre cou pour vous aider à avoir un meilleur sommeil. Moona est un système à base d’eau qui apporte de la fraîcheur et de la chaleur à votre tête de manière douce et naturelle, en garantissant la meilleure expérience de sommeil. Le produit se compose de 4 éléments. (Pas d'électronique sous la tête, c'est une membrane en mousse, traversée d'eau). 

 

DORMEZ MIEUX QUE JAMAIS 

Des médecins et chercheurs ont montré que, pour s’endormir, la température de notre corps doit diminuer (nous devons perdre environ 1°C). Pendant la nuit, des températures fraîches vous aident à mieux dormir. Au réveil, c’est le contraire : notre corps doit se réchauffer pour se réveiller en douceur et nous permettre d'être productif plus rapidement. Et notre tête joue un rôle majeur dans la régulation de notre température corporelle.

Une étude clinique est en cours sur Moona au CHU de Nantes.

 

CAPTEURS & FONCTIONNALITÉS CLÉS

Moona est associé à une application. Voici ces fonctionnalités principales :

  • Réveil naturel : Vous détestez votre réveil bruyant ? Des températures chaudes déclencheront un réveil plus naturel et vous prépareront à être productif plus rapidement. Si vous préférez (par exemple pendant les mois d’été plus chauds) vous pourrez aussi utiliser la fonction “réveil frais”.
  • Profil de température : Visualisez comment la température de Moona évoluera au cours de la nuit et réglez-la manuellement si vous le souhaitez (ºC ou ºF).
  • Analyse du sommeil : En fonction de vos mouvements pendant la nuit, Moona suit votre sommeil. L’application vous donnera des renseignements précieux sur la qualité de votre sommeil.
  • Analyse de l’environnement de la chambre : Grâce à des capteurs de température, d’humidité et de luminosité ambiantes, Moona analyse aussi votre environnement de sommeil, et étudie la corrélation entre la qualité de votre sommeil et votre environnement.
  • Conseils sommeil personnalisés : Moona utilise les données récoltées par les capteurs et vos retours dans l'appli, pour vous proposer des améliorations, des habitudes et des conseils pour améliorer votre sommeil. 

 

ALGORITHMES DE MACHINE LEARNING

Avec sa technologie brevetée, Moona apprendra au cours du temps à optimiser votre profil de température au cours de la nuit et des saisons.

Avant votre première nuit avec Moona, vous remplirez un questionnaire pour déterminer votre profil de dormeur. Ensuite, Moona vous guidera pendant 10 jours pour optimiser votre sommeil. Après, Moona continuera à adapter le profil de température (ºC/ºF) pour optimiser votre sommeil, en utilisant des données provenant :

  • du capteur de sommeil intégré
  • des capteurs de température et d’humidité ambiantes
  • des changements de températures effectués pendant la nuit
  • des vos retours fournis dans l’application

Notre système se fonde sur les dernières avancées dans la recherche sur le sommeil et nous entraînons le système avec les données fournies par nos beta-testeurs. Plus nous aurons d’utilisateurs, plus le système deviendra intelligent. Il sera ensuite capable d’apprendre et de s’adapter à chaque utilisateur plus efficacement.

 

DESIGN PRODUIT 

Votre chambre à coucher est votre cocon. Nous avons beaucoup travaillé pour créer un produit qui s’intègre dans votre chambre et qui vous permet de mieux dormir sans effort.

Moona est facile et rapide à mettre en place.

Même à 3 heures du matin, il est très facile de changer la température sur le boîtier si besoin.  Evidemment, pas besoin d’utiliser l’application au milieu de la nuit. Nous avons effectué plus de 200 tests utilisateurs pour assurer la meilleure expérience utilisateur, même au milieu de la nuit.

 

Conservez votre oreiller préféré :

Moona s’adapte à n’importe quel oreiller, peu importe la taille ou le matériau. Nos beta testeurs ont essayé Moona avec des oreillers synthétiques, à mémoire de forme, orthopédiques… Bref, de toutes sortes. Le sur-oreiller est une combinaison de mousse à mémoire de forme et des fins canaux d’eau.

 

CONFORT ET MATÉRIAUX

Nous savons que le confort est clef pour notre sommeil donc nous avons créé un produit qui non seulement améliore la qualité de votre sommeil mais rajoute aussi du confort.

"La fraicheur de l'oreiller est relaxante et très efficace pour s'endormir rapidement!" - Jake, 27 ans 

"Moona est très confortable!" - Luke, 30 ans 

"La mise en place est très simple. J'ai hâte chaque soir d'allumer mon Moona." - Sandrine, 47 ans 

Quoi de mieux que la sensation de fraicheur de l'oreiller frais en allant se coucher ? Et si vous pouviez avoir cette sensation toute la nuit ?

  • La membrane est flexible donc elle suit vos mouvements pendant la nuit
  • La membrane est recouverte de coton. Elle est déhoussable et lavable en machine
  • Le boîtier est très silencieux (<25dB)

 

ILS ONT TESTÉ MOONA... ET ILS ONT ADORÉ

Au cours de notre aventure, plus de 200 beta-testeurs nous ont donné leur avis sur notre produit. C’est plus de 350 nuits de sommeil… une année de données sur le sommeil !

 

L'IMPORTANCE DU SOMMEIL DANS NOS VIES

Même si nous n'en sommes pas tous conscient, notre monde est au milieu d'une crise du sommeil. Le manque de sommeil  a des conséquences profondes sur notre vie quotidienne. Cela affecte notre santé, nos performances professionnelles, nos relations et notre bien-être.

Un mauvais sommeil peut vous mettre à risque de plusieurs problèmes de santé, tels que:

  • Obésité
  • Diabète
  • Maladies cardiovasculaires et hypertension artérielle
  • Troubles de la fonction immunitaire

Comme le dit Arianna Huffington : "Ce n'est qu'en renouvelant notre relation avec le sommeil que nous pouvons reprendre le contrôle de nos vies". C'est pourquoi nous avons créé Moona, avec l'ambition de vous aider à mieux dormir et, plus important encore, vivre mieux.

 

LA RECHERCHE SCIENTIFIQUE 

Pour s'endormir, notre température corporelle doit refroidir: nous devons perdre environ 1°C. Et les températures fraîches permettent un sommeil plus profond: notre sommeil est le plus réparateur au minimum de la température corporelle. Au contraire, nous devons nous réchauffer pour nous réveiller et nous sommes les plus productifs lorsque la température de notre corps augmente. La tête et le cou jouent un rôle central dans la régulation de la température corporelle.

 

Pour développer Moona, nous travaillons avec des médecins, une étude clinique est en cours au CHU de Nantes. Voici quelques-unes des publications scientifiques que nous avons utilisées :

  • Kazue Okamoto-Mizuno, Kazuyo Tsuzuki, Koh Mizuno. "Effects of head cooling on human sleep stages and body temperature." International Journal of Biometeorology (December 2003)
  • Leon C. Lack, Michael Gradisar, Eus J. W. Van Someren, Helen R. Wright, Kurt Lushington. "The relationship between insomnia and body temperatures." Sleep Medicine Reviews (August 2008)
  • Nico Romeijn, Roy J. E. M. Raymann, Els Møst, Bart Te Lindert, Wisse P. Van Der Meijden, Rolf Fronczek, German Gomez­Herrero, Eus J. W. Van Someren. "Sleep, vigilance and thermosensitivity." Pflügers Archiv (January 2012) 
  • Roy J.E.M. Raymann, Dick F. Swaab, Eus J.W. Van Someren. "Skin temperature and sleep-onset latency: Changes with age and insomnia." Physiology & Behavior (February 2007) 
  • Saul S. Gilbert, Cameron J. van den Heuvel, Sally A. Ferguson, Drew Dawson. "Thermoregulation as a sleep signalling system." Sleep Medicine Reviews (April 2004)
story_txt:
Cliquez ici ou faites défiler vers le bas pour le français Ever wonder why you flip your pillow to the cool side when you cannot sleep? Because temperature is key to good sleep!Moona is a patent-pending smart sleep system that induces and deepens sleep, by smartly adjusting your head and neck temperature throughout the night. It will also help you wake up naturally, and be ready for the day! A clinical study is ongoing at Nantes Hospital, France.Our body needs different temperatures at different moments in the night. Moona understands your sleeping pattern and regulates the temperature of your head and neck to help you get the best sleep.
 Doctors have shown that temperature is a key parameter of sleep (Wall Street Journal).To fall asleep, our body temperature needs to cool down: we need to lose approximately 1°C (1.8ºF). And cooler temperatures help get deeper sleep. At the end of the night, it is opposite: our body needs to warm up to wake up gently and be productive quickly.Evolution of body temperature throughout the nightMoona is a water-based system which brings cooling and heating to your head in a smooth and natural way, guaranteeing the best sleep experience. The product is composed of 4 key elements. (There are no electronics under the head : just a thin membrane with water and memory foam.)  Getting good sleep is very important to making the most out of your day. With Moona, you will improve your mood and energy. Getting quality sleep is also key to your health. This why, from the very beginning of the project, we have worked with sleep doctors. In collaboration with the University Hospital Center of Nantes, we are conducting a clinical study to demonstrate Moona's efficacy.  Our world is in the middle of a sleep crisis but not everyone is aware of it. Lack of good quality sleep has profound consequences on our daily lives. It affects our health, our job performance, our relationships and our happiness. Poor sleep may put you at risk of several health issues, such as: 
Obesity, 
Diabetes, 
Cardiovascular diseases and hypertension, 
Immune function disorders... 
As best-selling author Arianna Huffington puts it: “Only by renewing our relationship with sleep can we take back control of our lives.” That’s why we created Moona, with the ambition to help you sleep better and, more importantly, live better. Sleep with Moona and enjoy the best your life has to offer.  
We have been very focused on making sure we leverage the power of technology. However we do not want the technology to take over your bedroom environment. That is why you do not have to use the app before you go to bed or during the night. And all transmissions from the product can be shut down during the night.
   With a patent-pending technology, the Moona smart sleep system will learn over time to adapt your temperature profile throughout the night and the year. Before your first night with Moona, you will fill out a sleep questionnaire to determine your sleeper's profile. Then, Moona will guide you through optimizing it during a 10-day period. After that, Moona will adapt the temperature profile (ºC/ºF) to optimize your sleep, using data from: 
the integrated sleep tracker,
ambient temperature and humidity sensors,
temperature changes made during the night,
feedback provided in the app.
Our system is based on the latest sleep research literature and we are training it with sleep data from our beta testers. The more users we will have, the smarter the system will get. It will then be able to learn and adapt to each user more efficiently.   Your bedroom is a cocoon. We have worked very hard to create a product that blends into your bedroom and an experience that seamlessly helps you sleep, without struggle.Moona is quick and easy to set up. Even at 3am, it is very easy to change the temperature on the product if need be, and of course you do not have to open the app for that. We have done more than 200 user tests to get a great experience - even in the middle of the night.  Keep your favorite pillow:Moona goes on top of any standard pillow, no matter the shape or material. Our beta-testers tried with synthetic, memory foam, orthopedic pillows and with all kind of shapes and sizes. We've iterated on more than 30 material combinations to guarantee optimal thermal efficiency and comfort. The pillow pad is an obsessively engineered combination of memory foam and thin water channels.   We know how comfort is key to our sleep so we created a product that not only enhances your sleep quality but also adds extra comfort to your sleep experience. Don’t you love putting your head on a cool pillow when you go to bed? How about if you could have that great feeling over and over again during the night?
The pad is flexible so it follows your move during the night
The cover is made of cotton. It is removable and machine washable
The bedside device is very silent (<25db, less than a whisper)
   Throughout our journey developing Moona, more than 200 beta-testers have given us precious feedback on our product. That is over 350 nights of sleep ... a year of sleep data ! Here is what some of them said:      
 To develop Moona, we are working with doctors. A medical thesis on Moona’s system is ongoing at the Hospital of Nantes. And here are some of the research papers we used:
Kazue Okamoto-Mizuno, Kazuyo Tsuzuki, Koh Mizuno. "Effects of head cooling on human sleep stages and body temperature." International Journal of Biometeorology (December 2003)
Leon C. Lack, Michael Gradisar, Eus J. W. Van Someren, Helen R. Wright, Kurt Lushington. "The relationship between insomnia and body temperatures." Sleep Medicine Reviews (August 2008)
Nico Romeijn, Roy J. E. M. Raymann, Els Møst, Bart Te Lindert, Wisse P. Van Der Meijden, Rolf Fronczek, German Gomez­Herrero, Eus J. W. Van Someren. "Sleep, vigilance and thermosensitivity." Pflügers Archiv (January 2012) 
Roy J.E.M. Raymann, Dick F. Swaab, Eus J.W. Van Someren. "Skin temperature and sleep-onset latency: Changes with age and insomnia." Physiology & Behavior (February 2007) 
Saul S. Gilbert, Cameron J. van den Heuvel, Sally A. Ferguson, Drew Dawson. "Thermoregulation as a sleep signalling system." Sleep Medicine Reviews (April 2004)
   Demo of Moona as of September 2017: We want Moona to be a night and life-changing product. That’s why we’re doing everything that is in our power to design the perfect sleep product. But we need your help - your feedback, suggestions, and above all, excitement - to help us build Moona up to the potential it can be.The funds we raise will go directly to help us deliver a high-quality product, that is rigorously tested and manufactured. It will help us invest in tooling for production, testing and quality assurance.Back our project, share our page, and let’s make this happen! We’re counting on you!     We would like to thank all of you who have contributed to bringing this project to life, through creative, technical, medical and financial support, and more importantly by testing, giving us precious feedback and insights to develop our product. This includes our friends and families, testers, mentors and advisors, HAX, Centrale Paris Incubator, Agoranov, Zagatub, the University Hospital Center of Nantes, La French Tech, Business France, BPI. Thanks to Sidekick Creatives for making our Kickstarter video.Here are pictures of some of the tests we have done. Thanks to all our beta-testers for their feedbacks and ideas!  Some of the designs we worked on  And here are some of our prototypes:  Press kit | Facebook | Twitter | LinkedIn -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------FrenchMoona - Régulation intelligente de la température de l'oreiller pour améliorer le sommeilVous êtes-vous déjà demandé pourquoi vous retourniez votre oreiller du côté frais quand vous n’arrivez pas à dormir ? Parce que la température est un facteur clé du sommeil !Moona est un système breveté intelligent qui permet de s'endormir plus rapidement et d'avoir plus de sommeil profond, en ajustant intelligemment la température de la tête et du cou tout au long de la nuit. Moona vous aidera aussi à vous réveiller naturellement et à bien commencer la journée ! Notre corps a besoin de différentes températures à différents moments de la nuit. Moona comprend votre rythme de sommeil et régule la température de votre tête et de votre cou pour vous aider à avoir un meilleur sommeil. Moona est un système à base d’eau qui apporte de la fraîcheur et de la chaleur à votre tête de manière douce et naturelle, en garantissant la meilleure expérience de sommeil. Le produit se compose de 4 éléments. (Pas d'électronique sous la tête, c'est une membrane en mousse, traversée d'eau).  DORMEZ MIEUX QUE JAMAIS Des médecins et chercheurs ont montré que, pour s’endormir, la température de notre corps doit diminuer (nous devons perdre environ 1°C). Un bon sommeil est la meilleure façon d'être en pleine forme pendant la journée et de bonne humeur! Voici ce que Moona permet :  CAPTEURS & FONCTIONNALITÉS CLÉSMoona est associé à une application. Voici ces fonctionnalités principales :

Profil de température : Visualisez comment la température de Moona évoluera au cours de la nuit et réglez-la manuellement si vous le souhaitez (ºC ou ºF).

story:
Whether you're nodding off during the afternoon slump at the office. working a double or night shift at work. or fighting drowsiness while driving, a power nap can make you alert and prodcutive. but only if you do it correctly. .

Naptime,thats all you need

It utilizes EEG sensors and Learning technology to analyze your brainwave activity. It calms you down by pushing suitable music and wake you up before you fall into deep sleep. to avoid  the sleep inertia.so you feel refreshed. Ready to tackle the rest of the day.

           

 

"The ultimate power nap." - Daily Mail

"Naptime smart eyeshade uses EEG technology to ensure that users not only fall asleep, but feel better rested when they awake." - Trend Hunter

"Naptime is a great gadget to help turn your power nap into a super power nap." - The Huffington Post 

 

 

Dry EEG Technology

The electrically conductive silicone touch your skin to detect your brain’s electrical signals. This data travels from our patented EEG algorithm chip to the Naptime app. The app learn from your data to pick the right music for you, wake you up at the optimal time,  calculate your Nap Score, gives you personal nap tips.

 

Hi-fi digital audio headphones

The best part? Naptime needs no batteries. The lightning/Mirco USB/Type-C cable draws charge from your devices, The cable has a volume control so you can adjust the sound without taking off the mask.

 

Your personal sleep DJ

The amazing part is during the music play process. Naptime adjusts to the type of music, the condition, and the volume via detecting your brainwaves automatically. When you're asleep, it will play pink noise to create a better sleeping environment.

 

Naptime App

The Naptime app is the brain of the whole operation. Download it for free to your iOS or Android smart device.

 The Naptime App uses your EEG data to:

      •      Play suitable music set in the intelligent music library to relax you and lull you to sleep;

      •      Start pink noise when you fall asleep to create a better sleep environment;

      •      Wake you up before falling into deep sleep, so you feel refreshed;

      •      Calculate your Nap Score: sleep quality、relaxation quality;

      •      Generate sleep curves that shows the relax duration and sleep duration;

      •      Give you personalized tips to improve your nap quality.

 

 

Packaging 

 

 

The ultimate power nap in the world, anytime, anywhere

Nap better at home, in the train, airport, or office etc. Just 10-20 minutes nap can boost your alertness, productivity, mood, creativity, and cognitive abilities, while lowering stress hormones in your body.

 

Improve Your Performance

Research done by NASA found that in 30 minute naps increased cognition functioning by up to 40%, and that those who worked without rest gained lower scores in intelligence tests.

 

Improve Your Health

To maintain optimum health and protect your heart, a short nap is a better use of time than consuming caffeine, biscuits and sugary foods — often common office practice.

 

Improve Your Mood

Having insufficient sleep can result in you not being the friendliest person to be around. Added rest will enhance your sense of well-being, giving you more capacity to interact graciously with others.

 

   

                    

Color Options

 

Timeline

Meet The Team

We are the Entertech team, and we focus on developing high-tech wearables for health, leading the way with dry EEG acquisition and ECG acquisition technology. We’ve been a member of Apple’s MFi developers program (Made for iPhone) since 2015.

Our R & D team consists of bioelectric data collection specialists from Zhejiang University, Hangzhou Dianzi University, University of York, and others. We cooperate closely with the Zhejiang Tongde Hospital and the College of Biomedical Engineering & Instrument Science at Zhejiang University.

We believe that sleep and relaxation (and their related health benefits like disease prevention) are important causes, and we plan to develop even more technologies for accurate health data monitoring after we bring Naptime to market.

Where we are, and where you come in

The Naptime eyeshade has passed through Apple’s MFi official certification, and we are putting the final touches on our working prototype.

Your support will make it possible for us to manufacture and ship Naptime units around the world. Why contribute? Well, you’ll be the first to get a Naptime eyeshade and you’ll enjoy more productive and relaxed days, thanks to better power naps.

And more importantly, you’ll help advance technologies in health monitoring, sleep, and disease prevention.

 

FAQs

Do I need an iPhone to use Naptime?

You don't need an iPhone to use Naptime. It also works on Android phones. Simply plug your Naptime lightning or Type-C connector into an iPhone or Android mobile device to access features like EEG readings, Music Sleep DJ, and sleep tracking via the Naptime app.

What’s in the box?

The basic order includes the Naptime eyeshade in your selected leather color, special Naptime earphones, and the Naptime EEG reader.

How many colors can I choose from?

You can choose from three colors - Pink, white, and black.

Do you ship internationally? Is shipping free?

International shipping is free with your purchase. There may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country, which you will be responsible for when receiving the shipment.

When do you start shipping?

May 2017. Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you placed your order. The Entertech team will keep you up to date on every step of the process.

What’s your return and exchange policy?

We have a standard 1 year manufacturer’s limited warranty. If there is any defect during the warranty period, we will repair your set free of charge or replace it with a new unit. 

 

Spread the Word

 

Thank you for your support!
