The best part? Naptime needs no batteries. The lightning/Mirco USB/Type-C cable draws charge from your devices, The cable has a volume control so you can adjust the sound without taking off the mask.

 
Your personal sleep DJ
The amazing part is during the music play process. Naptime adjusts to the type of music, the condition, and the volume via detecting your brainwaves automatically. When you're asleep, it will play pink noise to create a better sleeping environment.

 
Naptime App
The Naptime app is the brain of the whole operation. Download it for free to your iOS or Android smart device.
 The Naptime App uses your EEG data to:
      •      Play suitable music set in the intelligent music library to relax you and lull you to sleep;
      •      Start pink noise when you fall asleep to create a better sleep environment;
      •      Wake you up before falling into deep sleep, so you feel refreshed;
      •      Calculate your Nap Score: sleep quality、relaxation quality;
      •      Generate sleep curves that shows the relax duration and sleep duration;
      •      Give you personalized tips to improve your nap quality.
 

 
Packaging 
 

 
The ultimate power nap in the world, anytime, anywhere
Nap better at home, in the train, airport, or office etc. Just 10-20 minutes nap can boost your alertness, productivity, mood, creativity, and cognitive abilities, while lowering stress hormones in your body.


 
Improve Your Performance
Research done by NASA found that in 30 minute naps increased cognition functioning by up to 40%, and that those who worked without rest gained lower scores in intelligence tests.

 
Improve Your Health
To maintain optimum health and protect your heart, a short nap is a better use of time than consuming caffeine, biscuits and sugary foods — often common office practice.

 
Improve Your Mood
Having insufficient sleep can result in you not being the friendliest person to be around. Added rest will enhance your sense of well-being, giving you more capacity to interact graciously with others.
    
                    
Color Options TimelineMeet The TeamWe are the Entertech team, and we focus on developing high-tech wearables for health, leading the way with dry EEG acquisition and ECG acquisition technology. We’ve been a member of Apple’s MFi developers program (Made for iPhone) since 2015.Our R & D team consists of bioelectric data collection specialists from Zhejiang University, Hangzhou Dianzi University, University of York, and others. We cooperate closely with the Zhejiang Tongde Hospital and the College of Biomedical Engineering & Instrument Science at Zhejiang University.We believe that sleep and relaxation (and their related health benefits like disease prevention) are important causes, and we plan to develop even more technologies for accurate health data monitoring after we bring Naptime to market.Where we are, and where you come inThe Naptime eyeshade has passed through Apple’s MFi official certification, and we are putting the final touches on our working prototype.Your support will make it possible for us to manufacture and ship Naptime units around the world. Why contribute? Well, you’ll be the first to get a Naptime eyeshade and you’ll enjoy more productive and relaxed days, thanks to better power naps.And more importantly, you’ll help advance technologies in health monitoring, sleep, and disease prevention. FAQsDo I need an iPhone to use Naptime?You don't need an iPhone to use Naptime. It also works on Android phones. Simply plug your Naptime lightning or Type-C connector into an iPhone or Android mobile device to access features like EEG readings, Music Sleep DJ, and sleep tracking via the Naptime app.What’s in the box?The basic order includes the Naptime eyeshade in your selected leather color, special Naptime earphones, and the Naptime EEG reader.How many colors can I choose from?You can choose from three colors - Pink, white, and black.Do you ship internationally? Is shipping free?International shipping is free with your purchase. There may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country, which you will be responsible for when receiving the shipment.When do you start shipping?May 2017. Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you placed your order. The Entertech team will keep you up to date on every step of the process.What’s your return and exchange policy?We have a standard 1 year manufacturer’s limited warranty. If there is any defect during the warranty period, we will repair your set free of charge or replace it with a new unit.  Spread the Word Thank you for your support!

story:
We have cracked the code on drowning prevention

iSWIMBAND is an award-winning innovation that alerts you when your child is submerged in water too long.  Our patent-pending technology adds an extra layer of protection around pools, beaches, and lakes. Once activated and paired via our free app, it sends an alert to your smartphone if a non-swimmer enters the water and/or if a swimmer is submerged for too long.





Why iSWIMBAND? 

iSWIMBAND was originally developed because drowning is one of the leading causes of death for people aged 1-14 in 48 of 85 countries. Did you know, in the United States, over 4,000 people drowned last year alone? Drowning is the # 1 cause of fatality for kids under 5.  Some of the reasons for this are that it is extremely hard to detect, it can happen silently, and can occur in as little as 20 seconds. Sadly, 88% of drownings occur with some type of supervision present, meaning most of them may have been prevented. For every drowning fatality, there are five near-drowning victims, who suffer some type of neurological damage.





Our mission 

We are fathers and entrepreneurs who are aiming to make iSWIMBAND the new aquatic safety standard worldwide. Our goal is to streamline and increase our production efficiency to maximize mass affordability, thus  making it possible to achieve our mission of reducing drowning by 50% in 10 years.





                                                                                                             

http://abcnews.go.com/GMA/video/warning-system-prevent-children-drowning-25644729


http://www.cbsnews.com/news/new-app-aims-to-sink-child-drowning-risk/                                                                               




Free IOS and Android APP





Feature 1: 

Wristband 

The wristband is worn by non-swimmers. It will send an alert to a parent's smartphone if a non-swimmer enters the water. The "Red-Alert" alarm will sound in six seconds.






Feature 2: 

Clip-On 

The clip-on module is worn on the swimmer's goggle or swim cap. It will send an alert to a parent's smartphone if a swimmer is submerged too long.  You can set the alert from 20 to 60 seconds based on the swimmer's abilities.










Manufacturing / Fulfillment Timeline

It took 2 years for iSWIMBAND to evolve to where it is today. We have finished our first production run and will be shipping these award-winning wearables to our early INDIEGOGO supporters starting June 5th, 2015. 

Yup, you heard us right, we will start shipping iSWIMBANDS to our supporters starting June 5th, 2015!

With your support, we will bring production costs down  and  dramatically increase drowning prevention awareness and further expand our drowning detection technology for larger pools, camp sites, and swim schools. Our future V3.0 will have data tracking as well as expanded capabilities to protect boaters, older adults, and pets.

Protect your loved ones while helping us achieve our goal to reduce drowning by 50% within 10 years.  



National Retailers who will support iSWIMBAND
Very soon, you can purchase iSWIMBAND online with our participating retailers.




Join us, will you? 
The iSWIMBAND team

story:
LOURDES 2014

There are six of us planning to travel to Lourdes in July 2014, to volunteer to be Red-caps. This involves looking after sick or elderly people during their pilgrimage. We will be trying our best to ensure the people on the pilgrimage will have the best time on the trip as possible.

What Your Money Goes Towards

However, we need money to support us to pay for things such as the coach over, food and accommodation, and this doesn't come cheap, so your help is deeply beneficial not only to us but the people on the pilgrimage.

With your help we can give these people a once in a lifetime opportunity to visit Lourdes before it is too late. 

Thankyou for You're time..

story:
My name is Tina Patterson and I thank you for stopping by my page to listen to my story.  I found out that my youngest daughter Piper, had a traumatic accident and her father did not reach out to me. So now by the grace of god I have been able to speak with her through her grandparents. The accident see had was while she was under the care of her father, they were taking off motorcycle of a ramp and let the gate fall and it fell on top of Pipers head causing traumatic brain injury. 

I am seeking assistance in order to help my daughter after not seeing her for 3 years.I had left New Jersey 3 years ago due to many incidents with her father. I relocated temporarily to South Carolina to be safe from her father. Believe me I attempted to take Piper with me but since his family was known locally there was nothing I could do. Now after three years I am back in her life but unable to find the means to help with her medical bill. I am currently disabled I have a history of brain tumors and get a small check which helps me to live monthly.

I am trying to be help my daughter with her growing medical bills.  She had a very traumatic accident on June 15th 2013.   She has had three surgeries with the last being October 3, 2013. Her bills are up too high for her grandparents to hold on to alone. Her pop-pop is retired and her me-maw is disabled with many medical issues also. So you see why I am asking for this help. This is more than any person should have to go through. An with her being only five years old that's too young.

She is nominated as ambassador of the town through the elks lodge in Manasquan in NJ. They are honored her at her very own Princess ball on February 22, 2014.  Since both her grandparents want me in her life as I would love this also. Also being able to give them the donations that are gathered here would help so much also.

Here is something that Pipers aunt wrote about her and I wanted to share with you all to show how strong my little girl has been and what she has shown everyone I hope that you enjoy.

"Heroine = A heroine is defined as a girl of distinguished courage or ability, admired for her brave deeds and noble qualities. Piper is our heroine. Most of us in our entire lives will not show the amount of courage that Piper has shown in just the last six months. Her family has been so proud of how brave she has been not only since her accident but in adjusting to many other changes. Generally a child of her age is busy learning from those of us who are older but it has been Piper who has taught all of us a valuable lesson. She is truly our little gift that is loved and cherished ever day."

Now I am trying to get there to help as much as I can so if there is anything you can do to help out it is very much appreciated. 

Also Piper may have to go and have another surgery in June 2014 to place a plate into her head where the gate fell onto it.  Because when they did the surgery back in October 2013.  They told us recently after a CT scan that the placement of the piece of her skull they had from the accident wasn't fusing.  So what they may have to do is go in an put a plate there but we wont know til June 2014.  The below treatments is something she does weekly.  She has a very busy week for a little 5 yr old.

Pipers treatments consist of:

Occupational Therapy

Physical Therapy

Speech as well as Neurological therapy for her cognitive skills.

She sees a psychologist to talk about how she feels.

She has one on one teacher to help he to get back to where she was in school. Before the surgery she could write her name and knew her alphabet but now we are trying to get her back to where she was.


If anyone needs to reach me on this at any time please do not hesitate to reach out to me.  


Tina Patterson

(803) 370-1145 (cell)

*I have included in the gallery a picture of the main bill that is using most funds of mine up monthly.  As you can see 119% is going towards the interest and the rest towards the principle.  The exact amount that is needed is 4,507.62 as of 4/4/14 once this is paid everything will go more smoothly.  Every month I am paying $560.  Which only $59.00 goes towards the loan itself.  Which isnt that much as you can see.  I am trying to get to her soon as possible with your help I am hoping to make this possible.

To get this paid would allow me to be by my daughters side and help get some of her medical bills that her grandparents are dealing with relieved.  

*Thank you to recent donators that have given us some special perks to offer.

www.amazingwristbands.com 

www.charitycharms.com

www.pinkcalyx.com 

www.pikenursery.com

story:
I am a 9 year breast cancer survivor and a member of the "Against the Wind" BCS Dragon Boat Team. We earned a slot at the 9th Club Crew World Championships in Ravenna, Italy. This trip is fully funded by my team individually. 

I have been a long time athlete and was told after my surgery that I had lymphedema in my right arm and there were many things I would no longer be able to do. That is just not true.

I have been a member of this team since May of 2013 when I found out about them at the Komen Philadelphia Race for the Cure. My lymphedema has improved not gotten worse and the camaraderie and the support I receive from my teammates is the most rewarding part of the experience. 

We are all survivors and range in age from 25 - 80. Strong proud women that prove every day that our competitive spirit is still there after breast cancer.

These fund will be used totally to fund my trip to Italy and can be paid directly to the travel agent handling our travel.

I have attached a vidoe of our team in action. Look at us go.....

"When you push off from the dock...we're all in the same boat. This isn't about cancer anymore. It's about exercise and health and the rest of your life. When we push off we're paddling away from breast cancer."
Dr. Don McKenzie Founder, Abreast in a Boat — world's 1st BCS dragon boat team

Get the word out about Dragon Boating to other cancer survivors. There are lots of teams out there now but we could use a lot more competition.

Please remember to use your Indiegogo share tools and THANK YOU for your support!

story:
MOVING A MILE FOR MUSCLES!

 My name is Sophie, i am 20 years old from Scotland, I have a rare muscle wasting disease called Bethlem Myopathy,  which means i need to rely on using a powered wheelchair. I am volunteering for the Muscular Dystrophy Scotland facebook page and as a PR volunteer, 

This indiegogo is for supporting me to raise money for Muscular Dystrophy.  I myself will be moving a mile in my wheelchair,  On Thursday the 21st of August I will be out doing the mile with a good friend of mine Michelle in Glasgow City Centre and in my local area,

then i will be doing a second mile on Saturday 23rd of August with my nephews in my local area.

DATE OF EVENTS

THURSDAY 21ST AUGUST

SATURDAY 23RD AUGUST

WHAT IS MUSCULAR DYSTROPHY?

There are many different types of muscular dystrophy, and each affects different muscles. The severity of conditions and how they affect individuals varies greatly from person to person. Most conditions are progressive, causing the muscles gradually to weaken over time, and can either be inherited or occur out of the blue where there is no family history. Some forms of the muscle illness is life threatening and life changing. 

WHY WE ARE RAISING MONEY!

The Muscular Dystrophy Campaign is the leading UK charity focusing on muscular dystrophy and other related conditions. We are dedicated to beating muscular dystrophy and other related conditions by finding treatments and cures and to improving the lives of everyone affected by them


What donating means. 

The money you raise helps us to continue our vital work:

  • providing free practical and emotional support
  • funding world-class research to find effective treatments and cures
  • campaigning to raise awareness and bring about change

  • awarding grants towards the cost of specialist equipment, such as powered wheelchairs


Our work has five main focuses:

  • we fund world-class research to find effective treatments and cures
  • we provide practical information, advice and emotional support for individuals with muscular dystrophy and other related conditions, their carers and families
  • we campaign to bring about change and raise awareness of muscular dystrophy and other related conditions
  • we award grants towards the cost of specialist equipment, such as powered wheelchairs
  • we provide specialist education and development for health professionals.

story:
The state of healthcare in the United States is something we should all be ashamed of. Most of us have expensive plans with deductibles in the thousands of dollars.

Waiting for Democrats or Republicans to come up with a solution is like waiting for pigs to fly. Nice to see but unrealistic.

It's up to us. With your support, we can build a doctors examination chair that will drastically reduce the cost of healthcare, and give us options we never had before. The chair will give us the choice to be examined by a doctor anywhere in the world.

A doctor will be able to perform a full visual, front and back, before sitting down. Once seated, the doctor and you will be able to see each other at all times using state of the art video conferencing. With automated sensors and readings that automatically get sent to the doctor, errors that occur when someone has to manually perform these tests then write the information down will be eliminated. You will always have the option of seeing a doctor in person, but when you need to be seen right away, this chair gives you more options instead of going to the emergency room, costing you more money and adding the risk of catching something while you're there.

But we need your help. With your help we can build a working prototype that can be licensed for mass production, bringing the cost down so the chairs can be sent everywhere across the globe.

Help us improve healthcare for our children and everyone else who doesn't have the ability to simply go see a doctor when they need it.

Otherwise, it will be more of this:

or worse yet, this:

 

The Chair

The Telemed Chair will allow you to be examined anywhere in the world, including your home, by your doctor from his office. Using robotics, high definition cameras, microphones and sensors, your doctor will have the ability to perform a complete initial evaluation. 

Placing the Telemed Chair in inner city locations will help reduce visits to the emergency rooms, reducing the cost of healthcare to municipal governments, and eventually lower your taxes or preventing another increase.

Local doctors will be able to diagnose patients anywhere in the world a telemed chair is located, including developing countries or the battlefield.

Using cameras, sensors and robotic a doctor will be able to perform a full suite of tests:


Why

Enabling doctors to provide remote diagnostics and physical exam testing will help make seeing a primary care doctor as easy as going to the movies.  It will bring primary healthcare into areas where it is lacking. It is much less expensive to treat an illness when it begins. 

  • Unless something is done, such as enabling doctors to perform complete remote testing and diagnostics, who knows what's next for health care:


Additional Markets:

Health care centers and free clinics: locations that do not have enough doctors to meet demand

Government and non-profit agencies: Telemed chairs can be leased to government and non-profit agencies for placement in areas needed, such as shelters, YMCA locations and disaster areas.

Remote locations: Telemed chairs can be configured to accept magnetic medical cards or keypads to type information in for real time validation with insurance companies and connection to remote clinics, with a processing fee for each transaction. System would connect to next available doctor, or tell patient waiting time for next doctor to be available.

A high end luxury model will be developed for people who want to have one at home. This segment by itself may account for a large percentage of sales.

Questions and Answers:

Q. Will this chair replace my doctor?

A. No, it will be an additional tool, like a stethoscope, that will help your doctor provide care in a more timely manner, without requiring you to drive long distances or sit in waiting rooms for hours.

Q. How will this affect my insurance?

A. Insurance companies and the Federal government are looking into Telemedicine in order to reduce the cost of healthcare. Over time, we expect most insurance companies as well as the Federal government’s Medicare and Medicaid programs to accept usage of the chair.

Q. Will this put anyone out of work?

A. No. In fact, the chair may create additional jobs since nurses, receptionists and other staff will be required onsite where the chairs are located. Right now, doctors maintain staff at their primary location. With the chair, doctors will be able to open fully staffed remote offices.

Q. Will the quality of my healthcare go down?

A. No. Doctors will be able to perform the same type of examination for a primary evaluation they currently do in person using the chair.

Q. Why will my doctor want to use something like this?

A. Doctors, by their very nature, are on the leading edge of technology. A doctor who doesn’t keep up with new methods and tools is usually behind on illnesses and diagnosis as well. An informal doctor survey found that 88% would use the chair or any other tool that helps them provide better care for their patients. If your doctor is against telemedicine you should find out why. It is fine if your doctor doesn’t want to lose the social interaction and intimacy of physically seeing patients, but if your doctor is against technology, then it might be wise to look for another doctor.

Q. How will this chair help me?

A. You will have more options when you need primary healthcare. If your doctor is not able to see you right away, you will be able to have other doctors within your network see you. Doctors in certain areas are extremely busy and usually have a two to three week backlog. If all you need is a checkup, waiting that long is no big deal, but if you a tick bite, fever, flu, mild allergic reaction or other condition that is easily treated when caught early, waiting may result in a visit to the emergency room.

It will also make it possible for you to be seen by your specialist after the initial treatment without having to drive long distances. Post-operative visits to specialists usually require long drives for the specialist to have a quick look to see how you’re healing. The chair makes it possible for the specialist to see you in your own hometown, without having to drive hours or go through traffic.

Since vital data normally collected by the doctor’s office will be automated, errors which usually occur when someone does this manually will be eliminated.

Hospitals and clinics will be able to open health centers in urban areas that do not have enough doctors. Cities will be able to place the chairs in shelters and emergency crisis centers so that primary evaluations can be made by a qualified doctor without needing to send everyone to the hospital emergency room, reducing the cost of healthcare for most cities and government agencies.

The chair will reduce costly visits to the emergency room, saving you, your insurance company and the government money. It will also reduce the chances of taking sick days, since early treatment leads to a quicker recovery.

The chair will give you access to local primary healthcare on a 24 x 7 basis.

Q. Will the government allow doctors to do remote examinations?

A. President Obama has directed the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation (CMI) to test new models of care using telemedicine. The federal, state and city governments are all looking for ways to reduce the cost of healthcare. Telemedicine and tools like the telemed chair are options they are currently exploring.

Q. Is telemedicine a growing field?

A. Hospitals have been using telemedicine for quite some time. Remote surgery, which allows surgeons to operate remotely, is currently in use by the best doctors and hospitals in the world. Hospitals have also been using specialists in countries which have a 12 hour time difference to examine test results, eliminating the need to wake a local specialist in the middle of the night.

A BCC Research reports, Global Markets for Telemedicine Technologies, says the global telemedicine market has grown from 9.8 billion in 2010 to 11.6 in 2011 and is expected to reach $27.3 in 2016, $11.3 billion for technology and $16 billion for services.

The report says global telemedicine demand is growing and the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act is driving the increase of national adoption of the technology.

Telemedicine is also being adopted by several nations to close the gap in healthcare while lowering the cost of treating patients.

          other at all times using state of the art video conferencing.

story:
The name of the orphanage is "Le Cris des Enfants." It is located in Selembao in Kinshasa, the capital of Congo. The orphanage has a total of 50 orphans from 3 to 18 years. The orphanage receives help from individuals that supports the orphanage from time to time. Therefore, the orphanage is going through hardship because of the lack of a continuous support from individuals or other entities. However, during an interview with Mr Flamme, the president of the orphanage, he stated that he would rather have the children suffering with him under the same roof than leaving them on the streets.

One of the main problems the orphanage is going through is the lack of bed and mattresses. The orphanage has only 3 beds for 50 children. Therefore, some are forced to sleep on the floor. During the cold season, many children complain about the cold. On the other side, those who sleep on the bed also complain because the mattresses are too thin. They often feels pain because of the bed foundations.

The project is to buy beds, mattresses, and sheets for each orphan.
We care for orphans because they are the future and most of importantly because they are children.

Help us make The Handie a reality. The money you donate will go toward the mass injection molding of The Handie, so we can produce over ten times the inventory we are able to produce with our current handmade method. We will offer future generations of The Handie in multiple colors, as well as a left-handed version and our very first porn star-molded vagina Signature Series Handie!

·  We need just $69,000 to complete the creation of injection molds for mass production and inventory. In order to continue using the best state-of-the-art materials available and our high-tech production process, The Handie’s manufacturing costs have increased. We need your help to complete production. Of course, if we exceed our goal, we’ll manufacture even more, so men around the world can slip on The Handie and go solo!

·  Contribute to our campaign, and you’ll get a discount on orders for The Handie, as it becomes available fresh-off-the-production line! We have other great rewards like Handie stickers and T-shirts. Depending on your contribution, you can even get your own limited-edition version of The Handie!

· Do you like Pornstars? Well we got 'em! Go to www.TheHandie.com and vote for your favorite model to be the face of The Handie. Some of our rewards will allow you to not only help them become the face of The Handie, but give you a chance to meet them at a Handie commercial shoot, or see them get molded via a live webcast for their very own Signature Series Handie.

· Get great perks like our Handie T-Shirt! No one will ever know your a walking billboard for a wank glove! Send out the good vibes and the positive message telling people "Enjoy Yourself!".


Manufacturing Timeline:

We plan to complete manufacturing of the first 100 handmade, limited edition Handie for this Indiegogo campaign before the end of December 2014 and shipping out soon after. The second run of 100 will come soon afterwards. We will inform you when your shipment of The Handie is on its way to you. We will also inform you if there is any delay.


Other Ways You Can Help Us:

If you’re a bit tight on cash right now, or you simply aren’t ready to have your life transformed by The Handie, we won’t judge! There are other ways you can help ensure production of The Handie. Please send this page to your friends, so they can check out this great opportunity for themselves! After all, that’s what friends are for! If you sign up for our referral program and send enough people you may just get yourself a free limited edition Handie. 

A Quick Reminder:

We encourage you to donate and become eligible for our rewards, some of which include The Handie itself! But before you do, remember…

1. Your privacy is respected – You can contribute to our campaign anonymously by checking the box reading, “Do not display my name on the campaign page” when you make your payment.

2. Discretion is our middle name – Once you make a contribution making you eligible for The Handie, we’ll ship it to you discreetly in a plain USPS box and the shipping label will read “Rockit.” International shipments may be subject to additional duty fees or customs fees.

Updates & News:

We are extremely thankful for any and all support, and as a result, plan to constantly update this page with information and news about our progress. Please check back here weekly!

After You’ve Donated, What’s Next?

Now that you’ve helped support the biggest advancement in male pleasure since Kleenex, we invite you to stay up-to-date with The Handie’s progress via social media and our website, where you can join The Handie’s mailing list. You can also help spread the word about The Handie, so we reach our goal in order to help you reach your ultimate goal.

Facebook – www.Facebook.com/TheHandie

Twitter – www.Twitter.com/TheHandie

Website – www.TheHandie.com


Help choose the face of The Handie! 

Vote for your favorite Porn Star at http://www.thehandie.com/vote/

The contest winner receiving the most votes will be crowned our first official spokesmodel and featured in all future marketing and promotion for The Handie, including online and print ads, as well as commercials, events, and convention signings, so you can come meet her in person!

Through our Indiegogo campaign, you can even help support The Handie while also helping secure your favorite Porn Star's victory. Just choose from one of our extra vote perks and gift your favorite model an extra 5, 10, 20, 100, or even 200 votes to help her become the 1st Handie Girl! See our list of perks for more info. 

Be sure to cast your vote at http://www.thehandie.com/vote/



Check out our new commercial!

Guys... It's time to take the power back!

story:
Be a part of creating a true ERP solution for Magento.

Mage2odoo is not just another "connector". Mage2Odoo is a business suite of Odoo modules designed specifically for ecommerce companies using Magento.

Mage2Odoo

High speed integration with Odoo 8.0 to manage your business.

  • Developed for high velocity businesses. Tested with 50+ million revenue companies averaging 10-70,000+ products and thousands of orders per day.
  • American Made
  • Mass Import/Export. Export your entire catalog, make changes and re-import. Edit global attributes in Odoo, just like you can in Magento. Just filter, select your fields and input new values.
  • Uses the Magmi Datadump API for Product/Stock export to provide very fast updates
  • Manage configurable products in Odoo. Assign simple products and push them to Magento.
  • Manage any attribute on demand with easy to follow instructions.


    Authorize.net CIM

    Manage customer payments with secure tokens instead of handling sensitive cardholder data.

    http://www.authorize.net/solutions/merchantsolutions/merchantservices/cim/

    • Pre-Authorize funds in Magento, then capture them in Odoo.
    • Authorize & Capture online, automatically pay the order in Odoo.
    • Authorize/Capture funds from orders created directly in Odoo
    • Refund orders in Odoo.
    • Secure tokenization, without storing sensitive credit card holder data
    • Integrated with Magento
    • Standalone module can be used without Mage2odoo

    UPS/USPS Integration

    Generate and print shipping labels in Odoo.

    • Quickly manifest delivery orders in only a couple of clicks.
    • Central screen integrates both carriers
    • Designed for businesses with high order volumes. Tested with thousands of shipments per day
    • Standalone module can be used without Mage2odoo

        Whats supported in the first release?

        What is supported in the first release depends solely on funding. The more funding we receive, the more features the software will support. You may contact us directly to inquire about specific features. email openerpmaster@gmail.com

        • Sales order management
        • Visual datamapper enables you to add your custom attributes to Odoo
        • Payment management, Fulfillment Management
        • Customer with multi address support
        • Product Management/Configurable Management
        • Improved Warehouse Management functionality
        • Carrier integration (UPS/USPS)


          What isn't supported?

          • Mage2odoo is designed to support 1 Magento instance. Why? 80% of clients we have worked with have only 1 instance. Magento out of box supports multiple websites. Doing it this way significantly simplifies the connector, provides a more stable product, and makes it easier to support.
          • Mage2odoo is designed specifically for Magento. It does not integrate other services like Amazon, eBay, etc. You can however use already available tools to import these orders into Magento and then manage them in Odoo.

          Other Ways You Can Help

          If you are unable to contribute financially, you could help by sharing ideas, spreading the word and contributing to testing once Mage2odoo is released!

story:
On June 14-15, 2014, I will compete in the Liver life Challenge Mount Shasta Climb to raise funds for the American Liver Foundation – the nation’s leading nonprofit organization dedicated to liver health and disease prevention. My goal is to raise more than $ 2,500 for this worthy cause.  If I can get 250 people to donate $10 each, we will have reached this goal.  Will you help me by donating and getting your friends to see this as well?

Liver disease is often unknown or misunderstood. Here are some compelling statistics:

  • There are approximately 100 different types of liver disease, 1 out of every 10 Americans is affected by at least one type.

  • That is 30 million people - the equivalent of the combined population of America’s 15 largest cities!

  • Of the 26,000 people who die each year from cirrhosis, 60% have no history of alcohol abuse.

  • Nearly 17,000 people are on the waiting list for a liver transplant.

    The American Liver Foundation is dedicated to a future where there are effective treatments, cures, and no one dies waiting for a liver transplant. The Foundation provides research, education, advocacy and support for people living with liver disease, and aims to meet patients and families at their point of crisis to provide the resources they need.

    You can support my efforts by making a tax-deductible contribution to the American Liver Foundation:

    • Donate here,

      Paypal me directly, or

      Send me a check.

    • With your help, we will fund important work and raise awareness of these diseases that afflict millions of people. If you have questions about the Liver Life Challenge Mount Shasta Climb or the work of the American Liver Foundation, please do not hesitate to contact me. Thank you in advance for your support! 

For more information on the Liver Life Challenge, you can go to:

http://go.liverfoundation.org/site/PageServer?pagename=2012_llc_main


Thank you!

story:
My friend Nicole, recently got cancer. She is only 16 years old. It breaks my heart for things like this to happen, but they do. She has family and friends there for her always, but it really is taking a toll, mentally,emotionally, physically, and financially. I really want to help her but can only do so much. It would be amazing if you contributed to helping Nicole’s family through either a donation to Sergeant Harris or through this web page. She can take all the help she can get, and it would really mean a lot if nice people like you contributed and helped out.

 

Currently she has stage 4 Alveolar Rhabdomyosarcoma. A cancer that forms in
the soft tissues in the striated muscle, mostly in the arms or legs, chest, or abdomen.


 

Recently, she said she had an infection, "the worst a cancer patient could get." It will most likely happen again, and there may be a day she does not make it to the hospital in time, in which the outcome could be fatal. The only reason she made it this past time was because there was no traffic on the road she traveled; her life literally depended on traffic that day.

 

In a recent text message she wrote,

 

I was having fevers and they gave me antibiotics which kills all the germs in my body even the good ones except this one germ that is naturally in my stomach . When it sees the opportunity of no other germs sometimes it takes advantage and attacks my stomach and since I'm on chemo my immune system doesn't really work so it was tearing down my body I almost died because I was negative on blood, negative on fluids (way below dehydration) , and my blood pressure dropped to 4 ... Normal blood pressure for me is 60 and that's still really low ... So 4 is almost dying . That's why I needed 3 bags of blood, they saved my life . They also had to give me 6 bags of fluids [sic].

 

She shouldn't go through this…especially not alone.

 

All proceeds will go straight to her family, who will then use them as they see fit.

 

I’d like to thank you in advance for any donation. To be cliché “every bit helps.”

 

If you’d like to show your support a different way, please reach out.

story:
Summary

      The Healing Home will be a healing center, accessible to all regardless of finances, which will focus on holistic means of helping those who are in need of physical and emotional/spiritual healing.

      It has been a calling of mine to help others heal through holistic methods such as nutrition, nature therapy, herbal and homeopathic remedies, exercise, meditation, massage, acupuncture/acupressure, and counseling. These are valuable, and sometimes underutilized, pathways to good health and I feel that they should be accessible to all regardless of finances. Therefore, it is my vision to create Healing Home to fulfill this need.

      It will be a healing center servicing anyone from those suffering from domestic abuse to those suffering from cancer. Healing tools that will be available to visitors will include: housing, gardens, a library, healthy food, nutritional consultation, counseling, nature therapy, exercise, yoga, massage, water therapy, herbal and homeopathic recommendations, acupuncture/acupressure, and childcare assistance. There will also be outreach into the community through nutritional education in the form of communal meals/health talks.

     Part of the sustainability of Healing Home will lie in it's design. Costs of running the center will run lower than many other healing facilities due to conservation and self sustainability measures implemented in its design (to get an idea of what specific methods may be utilized you can follow these links http://www.wbdg.org/design/minimize_consumption.php,  http://www.wbdg.org/resources/water_conservation.php). In addition, many of the services offered through Healing Home will be done so through a group of collaborators who are willing to work with visitors on financial compensation for their services. Being a "pay what you can" center, it is expected that the funds received from visitors should cover a large part of the expenses of running the center, but other on-going sources of funding will be sought out to "fill in the gaps", so to speak.

     Healing Home is just in its beginning stages and still seeking a physical location here in the Southern Appalachians, so any donation received at this point will go towards obtaining the special place that this center will be created on. Land or facility donations would be AMAZING, but any form of donations, including informational donations in the form of advice/ leads to help this project along are accepted with humble gratitude <3 . The goal for this project was set so low only to insure that any funds donated are received (the goal must be met to receive any donations, but going over the goal is allowed).

story:
Approximately fourteen years ago we moved to the U.S with our family from war-torn Bosnia and Herzegovina. Since then we have made a great life and home for ourselves in this great country and have been blessed with so many wonderful things and opportunities. Today, we have created this fundraiser to raise funds and awareness for the recent flood catastrophe in Bosnia that once again has the region in a great state of turmoil.  

A state of emergency has been declared by authorities due to the worst rainfall and heaviest flooding the country has experienced in 120 years. Electricity and water supply are cut off, thousands have been evacuated, families have lost their homes and are left without food, dry clothes, and shelter.

The flood victims of Bosnia are in great need of our compassion and generosity during these difficult times. Every penny of your kind donations will be transferred/deposited to Red Cross of Bosnia and Herzegovina Federation and used to help displaced families and those in danger from the floods whether it’s for food, shelter, clothing, and other essentials in helping victims recover. In addition, we are currently in contact with the Red Cross in Bosnia to ensure that your contributions are utilized in the most effective way. 

Any amount you are able to contribute will make a difference. If you are currently unable to financially contribute please get involved by spreading the word to your family and friends. I know the people of Bosnia will be grateful and positively impacted through your involvement.

Feel free to contact us regarding any questions or comments you may have. 

Thank you!    

                                       

     "No kind action ever stops with itself. One kind action leads to another."

                                                 ~Amelia Earhart

story:
An allergy is a reaction by human body immune system to something that does not bother most other people. Allergies are a very common problem, affecting at least two out of every 10 Americans. Substances that often cause reactions are air pollution, pollen,dust mites, mold spores, pet dander, and many other elements.

Hello I am Dr. Son. My wife and my son have a seasonal allergy. Their symptoms include a runny nose, sneezing, itching, rash, and swelling. I and my family devoted over ten years to reduce seasonal allergy. Finally, I and my family made an anti allergy potable personal air pollution purifying system using water or mixed liquid. I will briefly explain you about related patented invention that we invented.

1. Field of the Invention

The invention relates to methods and apparatus for purifying contaminated air, and more specifically to methods and apparatus for forming a liquid filter using centrifugal force that is applied to the liquid to eliminate contaminants.

2. Description of the Invention

A device of the invention includes an air inlet structure and an air outlet structure. An invented device purifies air using a liquid filter which is formed when the air purifying compartment rotates. An invented device also includes a motor that is coupled to the air purifying compartment to enable the air purifying compartment to rotate around a rotational axis. The mixed liquid filter is formed by centrifugal force produced by the rotation of the air purifying compartment coupled to a motor.                      

An impeller which is at the air outlet structure creates a pressure difference which causes contaminated air created by a contaminant to move into a contaminated air transfer chamber, a contaminated air inlet, and a contaminated air inlet passageway to reach the air purifying compartment. 

3. Related Art

There are generally three techniques of purifying air.  One is the usage of a particulate or adsorption filter. Materials commonly used in these filters include, among others, glass fiber, cellulose paper, cotton, polyurethane, and other synthetic materials.

A second technique uses a sprayer. The basic operating principles of a sprayer is to capture the contaminants in the air using fine liquid particles and to control humidity simultaneously.

A third technique uses an electrostatic air filter. An electrostatic air filter first passes dirty air between ionizing wires which are at a high voltage.

Existing air purification filter systems have significant disadvantages.  First, particulate filters need regular cleaning, maintenance, and replacement.  In addition, the contaminants removed by the filters and used filters become another origin of contamination.  Secondly, a sprayer requires constant ejection of water to eliminate contaminants in the air, resulting in excessive usage of water. Thirdly, an electrostatic air filter requires a complex electronic device, and its initial installation cost is high.

4. Summary of the Invention

The invention has the following advantages:  First, because the air purifying system of the invention utilizes a simple mechanical structure and a simple purifying method, various costs associated with the invented system such as the manufacturing, maintenance, and operational cost are significantly lower than those of existing air purifying systems. Second, the invented system can provide various air purifying capabilities using centrifugal force and can purify air in multi stages.  As a result, the invented system can achieve a higher degree of purification efficiency in comparison with that of existing air purifying systems.


Large Scale Air Pollution Purifying System using Water or Mixed Liquid:

1. Principles

 Put centrifuge force, which is produced by rotating axis to liquid or liquid mixture.

 Put air to the arbitrary direction.

 Make chambers inside of outer column using curtains.

 Mix air and liquid or liquid mixture at the inside of chambers.

 Pass mixing air to space between rotating curtain and outer column where established liquid column produced by centrifuge force caused by rotating axis.

 Contain liquid or liquid mixture in outer column and air in inner column.

2. Applications

Replacing of the principles of exiting air filter, these principles can be applied for the living space of human being such as inside room air cleaner for housing, apartment, commercial building, and drink bar, air conditioner, motor fan, vacuum cleaner, inside of car, harmful-gas emitting vehicle, air smoke pollution factory, waste garbage trash burner, thermo-electric power plant, environmental glass, personal potable air purifier, HVAC system in building, inside of subway, subway station, air plane, submarine, and etc. 




3. Time Table

I.   Feb. 15 - May. 15, 2014

     Detail design for mold

II.  May 16 - Sep. 15, 2014

     Production

III. Sep. 16 -Oct. 15, 2014

     Shipping


4. Challenges 

Try to make world the first and the best personal portable anti allergy air pollution purifying system within budget.

story:
Thank you for helping us meet our goal! If you'd like to attend A Taste of Ghana or send in a donation, please visit our event page: http://www.eventbrite.com/e/a-taste-of-ghana-and-sharecare4u-fundraiser-12514-7pm-brooklyn-nyc-tickets-9954404893.

January 25th, 2014, 7pm
Bat Haus, 279 Starr St, Brooklyn, NY

Summary 
On January 25, 2014, A Taste of Ghana, an evening of the sampling the wonderful flavors of Ghana, will spotlight and create an awareness of an inspiring organization, Sharecare Ghana (also known as Sharecare4u), founded to empower people suffering from autoimmune and neurological conditions in Ghana.

My mother, Nana Yaa Agyeman, launched Sharecare Ghana in 2008, primarily as a patients’ support group. It has since evolved into an organization that not only creates awareness of the spectrum of autoimmune and neurological conditions (Multiple Sclerosis, Lupus, Type 1 Diabetes, Tranverse Myelitis, etc.), but also raises funds for research into these conditions and advocates on access for persons with disability in Ghana. 

Your Support and Its Investment
For A Taste of Ghana to happen, we need to raise $1500 to purchase food ingredients and drinks for a hundred people. The event will take place in New York City. Attendants of A Taste of Ghana will pay $30 per head (for a sampling of Ghanaian cuisine). The proceeds from the event will go to Sharecare Ghana. The evening's chef is Charles Cann, an extremely talented food artist and writer, who has graciously offered to cook pro bono in support of the event.

The Impact
One of Sharecare Ghana’s successes is the establishment of a therapeutic center for children with neurological conditions. The center now needs to be equipped. The money we raise will fund speech therapy, physiotherapy, and some of the following equipment: therapeutic mats, physio balls, toys, static cycles for kids, a treadmill, walkers, a standing frame, corner seat, wedges, gaiters, and an office desk and chair.

Other Ways You Can Help
We hope you can contribute, but if you aren't able to that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Please spread the word about this campaign through your various social media channels. For more information about Sharecare Ghana, please visit www.sharecare4u.org.

Thank you!

Sincerely,
Ayesha H. Attah
story_txt:
Thank you for helping us meet our goal! If you'd like to attend A Taste of Ghana or send in a donation, please visit our event page: http://www.eventbrite.com/e/a-taste-of-ghana-and-sharecare4u-fundraiser-12514-7pm-brooklyn-nyc-tickets-9954404893.January 25th, 2014, 7pmBat Haus, 279 Starr St, Brooklyn, NYSummary On January 25, 2014, A Taste of Ghana, an evening of the sampling the wonderful flavors of Ghana, will spotlight and create
an awareness of an inspiring organization, Sharecare Ghana (also known as Sharecare4u),
founded to empower people suffering from autoimmune and neurological conditions in Ghana.
My
mother, Nana Yaa Agyeman, launched Sharecare Ghana in 2008, primarily as a patients’ support
group. It has since evolved into an organization that not only creates awareness of the
spectrum of autoimmune and neurological conditions (Multiple Sclerosis, Lupus,
Type 1 Diabetes, Tranverse Myelitis, etc.), but also raises funds for research into
these conditions and advocates on access for persons with disability in
Ghana. 
Your Support and Its InvestmentFor A Taste of Ghana to happen, we need to raise
     $1500 to purchase food ingredients and drinks for a hundred people. The event will take place in New York City. Attendants of A Taste of Ghana will pay
     $30 per head (for a sampling of Ghanaian cuisine). The proceeds from the event will go to Sharecare Ghana.
     The evening's chef is Charles Cann, an extremely talented food artist and writer, who has graciously
     offered to cook pro bono in support of the event.
The
ImpactOne of Sharecare
Ghana’s successes is the establishment of a therapeutic center for children
with neurological conditions. The center now needs to be equipped. The money we
raise will fund speech therapy, physiotherapy, and some of the following
equipment: therapeutic mats, physio balls, toys, static cycles for kids, a treadmill, walkers, a standing frame, corner seat, wedges, gaiters, and an
office desk and chair.
Other
Ways You Can HelpWe hope you can contribute, but if you aren't able to that doesn’t mean you can’t help:
Please spread the word about this campaign through your
     various social media channels. For more information about Sharecare Ghana, please visit www.sharecare4u.org.Thank
you!Sincerely,Ayesha H. Attah

story:
------------------------------------------------------

CAMPAIGN SUCCESSFUL! PLEASE GO TO WEIGHTLOSSSTACK52.COM TO ORDER   

------------------------------------------------------

From the creator of Strength Stack 52 and Quick Sweat Dice!

---------------------------------------

Update: Stretch Goal Announcement!

Hey everyone. I have decided to add a stretch goal. I will throw in a FREE set of Quick Sweat Dice to everyone who pledged a mail-able reward if we can get funding to the $4,000 level. Quick Sweat Dice is a fun way to get a quick or intense competitive workout. It is the perfect companion to Weight Loss Stack 52.  Please share this campaign on Facebook (or another social network you are active on), tell your friends, or simply just buy another deck or two yourself for gifts. 

---------------------------------------

  • It’s a great way to get lose weight, anytime and anywhere. 
  • The durable 100% PVC plastic cards will ensure your cards will last as long as your weight loss does.
  • It's for any age group 
  • You won't be starving yourself
  • It's a fun way to lose weight by yourself or with others
  • Absolutely nothing extra is needed for you to lose weight. No meal plans, no pills, nothing.
  • Shoot, they're less than $20, when was the last time a weight loss program was less than $20!?
  • NO hype, just an honest, easy and fun approach to weight loss

Check out this video that explains the card features


Why Should I Order More Than One Deck?

Having more than one deck is useful for several reasons. First, it may be easier for you to count points with multiple decks. Second, you may want to keep a deck at the office and a deck at home. Third, and most importantly, Weight Loss Stack 52 is most effective when you're competing with a friend (trying to get the most points). So give that extra deck to your friend (or a group of friends) and get motivated to lose weight, together!

(Learn about Strength Stack 52 here)

Step 1: Once you receive the cards simply flip through them and get familiar with the information on the cards. Change nothing about your daily routine for 7 days, this is your baseline week. All you are going to do is keep track of your points and at the end of your seventh day, total your points for the week.

Step 2: Continue tracking points with another 7 day period, but this time, try and beat the previous weeks point total by accomplishing tasks on the gold card and avoiding tasks on the red cards.

Step 3: After the second week you should be very familiar with the activities on the cards.  Continue tracking points every 7 days with the goal of beating your previous seven day point total.  

That's it! You can also compete with a friend (or group of friends) to see who can get the highest score.  You will see yourself making better decisions that contribute to your weight loss goals. If you have more points one week than the previous week, then you know you made healthier weight loss decisions and therefore will start to lose weight. 

You will feel better, look better and have the knowledge to make better weight loss decisions for your entire life. These simple cards will retrain your brain! All of that for less than 20 bucks! Couple these cards with Strength Stack 52, and you’re on the fast track to success!

---------------------------------------

FAQ

I'm adding an FAQ section because so many of you have the same questions. Please ask away, I am here to help!

1) Should I buy more than 1 deck?

One deck is enough for one person, but what makes Weight Loss Stack 52 so powerful is that you can compete with others for the highest score. If you want to compete with others, then by all means, order multiple decks.

2) How is Strength Stack 52 integrated into Weight Loss Stack 52?

To truly lose weight and keep it off, you need to increase your muscle mass and decrease your fat. Muscle burns fat! Because of this both of the products can be used together to compound the results. 

3) What is the motivation behind the cards?

The motivation is to earn more points this week than the prior week. If you are earning more points you are making better behavioral decisions that lead to weight loss.

4) I see Quick Sweat Dice in one of the rewards, what is that?

Quick Sweat Dice is a fun game where players compete for points. Each dice has bodyweight exercises on them, so no equipment is needed. Players can compete in quick games for a quick workout, or long games for an intense workout.

5) How do I keep track of the points?

Their are lots of ways. Personally, I use an app called Evernote. Most people just flip a card to the back of the deck (and some even put it upsidedown) once they earn the points on the card. Then, at the end of the day, they just write the total down on a piece of paper or in a Word doc on their computer.

story:
What are we attempting to accomplish? 


Our team of four 2nd year physical therapy students and 2 licensed PT's have a very exciting opportunity serve the underserved in Haiti for a week. We're looking to take advantage of this opportunity as best we can, and the only way for us to make this a reality is to reach out to our friends, family, and co-workers. The total cost of this endeavor is a whopping $5800 -- which includes room, board, translator, food, and transportation for the entire team. 

So, we need your help. 

This trip is extremely important to our team, and will provide a valuable and unforgettable experience to those involved and those being served. We are all participating as volunteers, and while everyone is excited about this experience, the school is unable to provide financial support. 

If you could take a moment out of your day to consider donating (even small amounts are helpful), or sharing our campaign, we would appreciate it. Even if we don't reach our goal, all of our funds will be divided equally among team members towards the overall cost of the trip. 

Word of mouth is a powerful tool that facilitates success, and we would like to take advantage of it as best we can. 


Made it through this far? Here's a little background:

 After graduating from physical therapy school I learned about an organization called Health Volunteers Overseas began planning a trip to Vietnam to provide physical therapy to those in need.   I had gotten as far as almost purchasing a ticket, but it was early in my career and I just couldn't afford to go.    Fast forward 30 years and an opportunity has presented ________.    I am currently a faculty advisor for the Community Service Project--Global Outreach in our program.    This year in addition to serving the underserved through a local organization, four students on the project asked "can we go to Haiti?"   This caught me by surprise and after a long pause,  I said--let's do it!!!!

At APTA's CSM meeting in New Orleans 2011--we presented the current Global Outreach project at the Global Outreach Reception which is where I met a PT from Medical Teams International MTI) who was working in Haiti and I expressed my interest in bringing students to help and she said " Absolutely, Bring them down---we have student teams all the time".

We will be partnering with Medical Teams International (MTI) for this trip. This is the first international trip students from our program will be making, and we hope that its success will encourage further opportunities in our division. 

Students have held several fundraising events on campus, but they are now out on their rotations and have limited ability to fundraise at this time.

story:
Convenient Nutrition

Imagine sitting in a crowded airport, waiting to board the plane that is taking you on a tropical vacation. You're all packed and excited; you have your swim suit, your sandals, and a week's supply of vitamins. Wait... the last thing you do is pack your vitamins, right? Well, that's about to change! Not only are our innovative 1 ounce pouches welcome on airplanes, they fit virtually anywhere without taking up any unnecessary space. Now, besides your multi-vitamin, what if one of the products in your weeks' supply was an anti-hangover supplement? A natural sleep aid? A natural energy formula? What kind of impact would these drinks have on your overall trip? At NutraLiquids, we pride ourselves in bringing you, the consumer, the highest quality of natural ingredients in the most convenient possible form.




What We Need & What You Get

We've already received product orders from Amazon, and we need your help in order to start our first round of production! We estimated that we need $50,000 to get the first set of products out, and that money will go directly to creating products, packaging, and distributing to vendors.

If we don't reach our goal, this money will still go towards production and moving closer to our goal of having products on shelves in the first quarter of 2015.

Our Company

NutraLiquids develops nutraceutical vitamin, supplement, and functional beverage products for the consumer packaged goods industry. Our company develops unique products based on natural ingredients with leading edge packaging for the general retail market. The company's products target all sectors of retail, from online retailers such as Amazon, to brick and mortar grocery, pharmacy, convenience stores, big box retailers, and membership retailers such as Costco.

Our company has developed all of its products internally with many years experience in liquid supplements. Our line consists of 16 natural and gluten-free nutraceutical products, all available in sleek and sexy 1-ounce ready to drink pouches. We develop unique products with great brand names such as Restera, an all natural sleep support product; AirArmor, a natural immunity support product; and PreFade, an all-natural anti-hangover drink. The products are packaged in retail ready boxes which can be simply opened and placed on store shelves and register counters.


Today, many people are suffering from chronic diseases and disorders that may be linked to vitamin deficiencies. In our 16 product line, we have supplements that are aimed at the most common health problems that are wreaking havoc on our population today. Our quick and easy daily doses help to simplify peoples lives in this busy day and age. As knowledge of the importance of supplementation is becoming more widespread, the Nutraceutical space is starting to go crazy. Are you interested in taking a part in the Nutraceutical Revolution?


In order to get our products on shelves near you, we are asking for your help! By contributing to our Indiegogo Campaign, you will not only help our company to grow, but you will help millions of people get access to improved health and nutrition. The better people feel, the happier and more successful they are!

                                    


AIR ARMOR: Air Armor is an all-natural immune support that helps defend against colds and flu by supporting the body's natural defenses. Air Armor is a natural blend of herbs and other nutrients targeted at preventing common illness. Convenient pouches fit easily into bag, briefcase, glovebox, and more, making Air Armor ideal for travel, office, school, and any other occasion when exposure to crowds can't be avoided.

CAL MAG ZINC Strawberry: Vitamin D, Calcium, Magnesium, & Zinc in a delicious blueberry flavor! Calcium, magnesium, and zinc are three of the most important minerals your body needs to function. Calcium is used to build and maintain bones and teeth, and we've added Vitamin D that the body needs to utilize calcium! Magnesium and zinc are both widely used by cellular processes and organ systems throughout the body. 

CAL MAG ZINC Blueberry: Vitamin D, Calcium, Magnesium, & Zinc in a delicious blueberry flavor! Calcium, magnesium, and zinc are three of the most important minerals your body needs to function. Calcium is used to build and maintain bones and teeth, and we've added Vitamin D that the body needs to utilize calcium! Magnesium and zinc are both widely used by cellular processes and organ systems throughout the body.

CAL MAG ZINC Pina Colada: Vitamin D, Calcium, Magnesium, & Zinc in a delicious blueberry flavor! Calcium, magnesium, and zinc are three of the most important minerals your body needs to function. Calcium is used to build and maintain bones and teeth, and we've added Vitamin D that the body needs to utilize calcium! Magnesium and zinc are both widely used by cellular processes and organ systems throughout the body.

ELECTRIC ENERGY: Synergistic multi-hour energy formula including electrolytes to help the body replenish what is lost through activity and antioxidants for overall health. This product is an effective and natural way to improve alertness and endurance for hours. Blended from natural herbs, Electric Energy is a great way to help stay on top of a busy day. In Strawberry-Trioberry flavor!

KIDS DAILY: Extra potency children's multivitamin in delicious blended citrus flavor with orange, pineapple, mango, and banana! This product is a full and balanced nutritional support for kids, with a full compliment of vitamins, minerals, trace elements, anti-oxidants, and function specific supplements. Kids Daily supports all of the body's many needs and helps promote overall health, longevity, and total well-being.

LEMONADE DETOX: A traditional master cleansing lemonade diet formula with the additional natural cleansing power of ginger, cinnamon, aloe, and sage! For over sixty years, the lemonade diet has helped countless people detoxify and rejuvenate. Lemonade Detox is a fortified cleansing diet support drink that brings you the time-tested lemonade diet formulation with ready-made convenience, enhanced with the natural cleansing power of ginger and aloe. Our concentrated formula makes 8oz lemonade from a 1oz pouch, or 30 8oz glasses from a 30oz bottle. Easy to carry pouches ensure that a cleansing diet drink is with you for work and travel.

LIQUID VITAMIN D3: This product is a fast absorbing, 5000 IU per serving, gluten free, and vegetarian formula in delicious tropical cherry flavor. Vitamin D3 supplementation may help prevent heart disease, diabetes, weakness, muscle wasting, and osteoporosis, while helping to retain bone density. Our liquid form is fast-absorbing, making the supplements of best use to the body. Tropical cherry flavor.

LIQUID DAILY: This product is an extra potency adult multivitamin in delicious blended citrus flavor with orange, pineapple, mango, and banana! A full and balanced nutritional support for adults, Liquid Daily contains a full compliment of vitamins, minerals, trace elements, anti-oxidants, and function specific supplements. This product supports all of the body's many needs and helps promote overall health, longevity, total well-being, and everyday energy while helping fight illnesses. 

OMEGA 3-6-9 Pina Colada: Vegetarian Omega 3, 6, 9 complex for cardiovascular health provides essential fatty acids that the body cannot produce on its own. This product helps fight cholestoral and blood pressure related conditions, while addressing many other health needs. 

OMEGA 3-6-9 Blueberry: Vegetarian Omega 3, 6, 9 complex for cardiovascular health provides essential fatty acids that the body cannot produce on its own. This product helps fight cholestoral and blood pressure related conditions, while addressing many other health needs. 

OMEGA 3-6-9 Strawberry: Vegetarian Omega 3, 6, 9 complex for cardiovascular health provides essential fatty acids that the body cannot produce on its own. This product helps fight cholestoral and blood pressure related conditions, while addressing many other health needs. 

PREFADE: Hangover prevention in Lemon-Lime-Tangerine flavor, PreFade is taken before you drink alcohol so it's already working when tomorrow comes. We use a natural blend of nutrients designed to replenish what overindulgence takes away when mixed with plenty of water. 

RESTERA: All-natural sleep aid that helps you to relax and get to sleep more easily. We use nature's own relaxation compounds, including melatonin, herb, and plant derivatives. Ideal for travel, Restera comes in a vanilla cream flavor.

SPORTFLEX: This product is a glucosamine, chondroitin, and collagen antioxidant superfruit mix in a delicious blended fruit flavor. Sportflex provides targeted nutritional support critical to joints in an antioxidant-rich superfruit juice that also incldes acai and mangosteen. This product helps to fortify cartilage and connective tissues stressed by athletic activity or deterioration due to aging, promoting flexibility and smooth, pain-free movement.

TRIMLITE: All-natural superfruit blend that helps boost metabolism and burn away fat with no caffeine and no jitters! Helps reduce appetite and food cravings with a concentrated liquid that absorbs quickly and completely. Our exclusive energy enhancing formula includes acai berry, black currant, maca root, elderberry, and cupuacu alongside a full range of critical nutrients and antioxidants for your body. Trimlite comes in a tangy berry flavor.
